**The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Highest Dao**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Highest Dao* (abbreviated as *The Jade-Pure Hidden Writings*). Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition. Originally comprising four scrolls and eight chapters, later divided into four texts:

1. *The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings: Scripture of the Divine Wisdom of the High Mystery for Subduing Demons* (three chapters);
2. *The Supreme Highest Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Jade Emperor’s Divine Wisdom for Subduing Demons* (three chapters);
3. *The Supreme Highest Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Golden Prime and Cavern-Luminance for Subduing Demons* (one chapter);
4. *The Supreme Highest Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Golden Prime and Feathered Chapters* (one chapter).

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Tradition*, Zhengyi Section, Part One.

---

### *The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings: Scripture of the Divine Wisdom of the High Mystery for Subduing Demons*

This divine scripture emerges from the oral formulas of the Supreme Great Cavern, concealing the celestial and terrestrial sounds of the myriad essences. It was transmitted to the Jade-Pure King of Divine Radiance, the Subduer of Demon Kings, to command demons and summon perfected beings, thereby rectifying and restraining the myriad spirits.

The Most High, accompanied by two hundred and seventy jade maidens of the Upper Palace and two hundred and seventy jade lads of the Golden Immortals, attends to incense and dust-whisks, guarding the divine texts in secret within the Three Primes’ Purple Chamber of the Most High, in the Palace of the Six Harmonies.

The Jade-Pure Lord of the Imperial Sovereign roams above the Cavern-Perfect, feasting on the Dragon Mountain of Radiant Scenery. At times, he invites the exalted guests of the Jade-Pure, the Great Divine Subduer of Demons, the Jade-Pure King of Divine Radiance, to recline in the chambers of jasper and jade, the golden-flowered abode. After a three-year purification fast, he unfolds and recites the *Supreme High Mystery’s Perfect Text of the Lofty Mystery*. Its divine marvels arise spontaneously; its wondrous purport illumines the ten directions. Its lofty cadences resound clearly; its jade brushstrokes gleam like crystal. The numinous splendor adorns the flowery court, blazing across the Great Void. The Eight Emperors align their visions; the Five Ancients flank the perfected. The Primordial Beginning shines forth; the Celestial Prime unfolds in full. Tamed beasts crouch in submission; fierce steeds bolt in terror. The Great Marshal brandishes his banners; a hundred million cavalry array in ranks. Demons are restrained, and evil spirits seized; proclamations disperse the myriad spirits. Mountains and seas grow still; the Three Luminaries merge in brilliance.

Thereupon, the Imperial Lord himself plucks the *Cloud-Zither of the Dragon Mountain of Radiant Scenery*. A hundred harmonies join in chorus; jade tones resonate through the Great Void. The desolate and pure flow forth; jade sounds stir the *qi*. The Eight Winds converge with the perfected at the Central Heaven; the Five Florals array the immortals at the Four Extremities. Divine whistles arise from the gates of jade and jasper; wondrous melodies issue from the mechanism of the Great Cavern.

Then he commands the Jade Maidens of the Dragon-Flower Terrace of the Northern Frigid Golden Platform—Yu Xiaoming, Ding Yunfu, An Yanchang, Fei Siqu, and others—to join in singing the *Poems of the Supreme Cavern Spirits* and the *Melodies for Subduing Demons and Summoning the Perfected*. Their lyrics declare:

> By paired radiance, we urge our flying canopies,
> Swift reins float through the Eight Pures.
> We adjust our reins to open the cinnabar thoroughfare,
> Casting glances to feast in the cloud encampments.
> Harmonizing with the divine, we drift on the waves of the ford,
> Lifting our steps to tread the frigid court.
> Dragon pennants leap with jade substance,
> Feathered robes trail in kingfisher and purple hues.
> Soaring beyond the Six Ridge Terraces,
> In profusion we descend upon the Phoenix City.
> Escorting the Divine Radiance King,
> We ascend to the grand assembly in the Supreme Capital.
> Gazing up, we part the Three Simplicities’ chambers,
> Long mists scatter across the Eight Seas.
> The Perfect Dao hastens to the Orchid Palace,
> Ethereal, it arises from the Void above.
> Towering peaks connect to wondrous visions,
> The Great Splendor illumines the Jade-Pure.
> Accumulated diligence moves the Primordial Simplicity—
> Who can fathom its form or name?
> Awaiting the kalpa’s unended dawn,
> In an instant, the myriad ages commence.
> The dark workings have their own convergence—
> How could one know the heavens and earth would overturn?
> Riding the destiny of self-arising,
> We urge our radiance to traverse the Northern Prime.
> Flowing auroras follow our return,
> Flying canopies shade the verdant axles.
> Ascending the Fourfold Brightness Gates,
> Flowering jasper adorns the Golden Portal.
> Divine radiance penetrates the Orchid Peaks,
> The Three Luminaries shine forth, already distinct.
> Congealing clarity to generate *qi*,
> The Eight Assemblies lay bare the hidden sources.
> Vast and boundless, the Primordial Han begins,
> The Great Yang harmonizes with the morning court.
> The numinous transforms the Four Canopy Courts,
> The wondrous flows unimpeded, the Dharma complete.
> The Dao of natural principle unfolds,
> Luxuriant as the Supreme Highest Texts.
> A thousand demons cannot be bargained into life—
> They are restrained, the demonic hordes of heaven.
> The Primordial Assembly roams the Great Cavern wilds,
> Gathering essences to pluck the sun’s soul.
> Containing the essence, refining in the cinnabar chamber,
> Eternally preserved without end.
> Turning the chariot to rest in the cinnabar chamber,
> Silently contemplating the High Mystery.
> Leisurely and still, free from worldly dust,
> Gazing upon the guests of the auroral realm.
> Concentrating the spirit to mark the Nine Ridges,
> Linking watches to continue the long mists.
> Three candles illumine the Great Splendor,
> The Void’s extremity gives birth to the perfected.
> Radiant scenery gleams over the Jade Continent,
> Harmonizing the spirit to order the flowery years.
> The hidden encounter responds to the dark convergence,
> Faint and distant, it follows the shifting radiance.
> Myriad inspirations arise of themselves—
> Good counsel, too, has its ford.
> The Jade Emperor governs his numinous heart,
> Whispering through the Ninefold Heavens.
> Alone, I tread the dark ridge peaks,
> My thoughts dwelling in the spaceless.
> Without the High Immortal’s cadence,
> How could I tread there, and why seek the green?
> The Dao’s treasury holds the Golden Ultimate Chapters,
> Treasuring my Jade-Pure Stanzas.
> The Great Void penetrates the Mysterious-Perfect,
> Within purity, the Mysterious Subtle arises.
> Azure clouds encircle the cinnabar chamber,
> The distant realm gleams with purple radiance.
> Raising my feet over the myriad ford-waves,
> With mysterious steps, I ascend the jade portals.
> The Eight Winds drum the lofty peaks,
> How mournful the ten thousand clouds!
> Dragons and phoenixes cry in the Nine Auroras,
> What sorrow in the birds’ songs!
> The numinous realm has no bounds,
> On all sides, emptiness hangs.
> Vast and boundless, the Milky Way’s path,
> Drifting, drifting, to the Shangqing precincts.
> The dark abode responds to the convergence of resonance—
> The Perfected One’s heart holds the Mysterious Stillness.
> Counting the kalpas as they unfold,
> Principle’s extremity returns the spirit of itself.
> Reciting aloud the Supreme Highest Texts,
> Secretly seeking to reverse the withered blossoms.
> Turning the poems to summon the perfected,
> Divine wisdom transforms Heaven’s might.
> Issuing commands in accord with the Mysterious Talismans,
> Grasping the tally to march upon the Supreme Subtle.
> Wondrous awakening knows no obstruction,
> The vast numinous barrier opens.
> Merging radiance to return to the tranquil axle,
> Soaring high beyond the ridge’s flight.
> Mysteriously dwelling in the layered Void’s halls,
> In stillness, I contemplate the return of the lofty spirit.

Upon the song’s conclusion, the Lord Emperor thereupon commanded the Five Venerable Perfected Ones to request the *Supreme Highest Great Cavern Demon-Quelling Divine Wisdom Lofty Mystery True Scripture* and the *Jade Clarity Concealed Writ*, encasing it in a cloud-brocade pouch and sealing it with the *Heaven-Opening Seal*. He entrusted it to the Left Duke of the Immortal Capital for transcription within the Jeweled Palace, assigning thirty-seven Jade Flower Maidens and thirty-seven Golden Dawn Jade Lads to hold the towels and tend the incense, guarding the divine text.

In accordance with the *Bright Statutes of the Four Poles*, it is transmitted once every seven hundred years, reserved solely for those whose names are inscribed in the *Mystery-Free Imperial Register* from former lives—those of golden bones and jade marrow, whose destiny aligns with transcendence—never to be heard by the uninitiated. Its Way is lofty and wondrous, hence called the *Concealed Writ*, treasured and kept secret by the Most High, never passed to the lower worlds. To recklessly divulge its sacred text is to incur the wind-blade’s judgment, bringing calamity for ten thousand generations.

The *Supreme Divine Scripture* bears the secret taboo names of the exalted perfected above and records the sounds of heaven, earth, and the myriad spirits below, employed to summon immortals and quell demons, to unseal the gates of the hidden. All derive from the oral instructions of the Supreme Highest, applied to the *Great Cavern True Scripture*. The Supreme Lord wields the brush to inscribe it; the Great One sweeps the mat; the Jade Youths compile the passages; the Heavenly Consorts weave the chapters; the Five Emperors collate and proofread, thus completing the numinous text.

The Five Venerable Ones oversee the trial; the Left Immortals assist the perfected; the Great Flower tends the incense; the Golden Dawn stirs the smoke. Divine marvels arise in abundance; jade wisdom illumines the profound. Its numinous transformation wields power throughout heaven and earth; its literary splendor shines upon the Highest Clarity. When uttered, its voice resonates with the Supreme Subtle; its lofty chant echoes afar. To recite it once is to startle the Nine Heavens into listening, to move the Jade Emperor to reverent response, to summon the myriad perfected to attend the court, to extinguish the host of malevolent forces, and to topple the demon kings of heaven. Practicing this Way, one’s *qi* ascends to the pure empyrean, spreading blessings across the nine ford-crossings, redeeming the seven ancestors, and rebirthing them in the heavens above.

Such is the wondrous and precious nature of this divine scripture—its excellence is beyond all reckoning. Whenever one cultivates the *Great Cavern True Scripture of Returning Wind and Blending Harmony* in its thirty-nine chapters, one must first recite the *Supreme Highest Demon-Quelling Divine Wisdom* once, to dispel trials and summon the perfected, to unseal the three barriers, to gracefully restore the bodily form, to cause orchid-*qi* to suffuse the ford-crossings, to settle the myriad spirits in their proper places, to harmonize the jade voice, and to attune the *qi* until its resonance is pure. Only then may one recite the wondrous verses, their golden tones ringing clear in the Supreme Highest, their sublime purport gleaming radiantly across the ten directions. Thus do the August Elders remotely oversee the cinnabar trials; the Three Primes inscribe the records in the Purple Chamber; the seven ancestors are rescued from the dark paths; rebirth is granted in the Southern Immortal Realm. Life and death partake of its blessings; glory and beauty flow to one’s kindred. Its Way is profoundly secret—it must not be recklessly proclaimed. To carelessly reveal its divine sounds is to drown in the river’s source, to incur the seven ancestors’ reproach, to bind one’s sins in the dark mountains. The *Nine Heavens’ Forbidden Writ* is not to be transmitted to the unworthy.

**The Jade Clarity Concealed Writ of the Great Cavern Demon-Quelling Divine Wisdom**

The dark radiance scatters at heaven’s edge,
The clear Han thins as clouds drift back.
Wondrous *qi* illumines the Three Dawns,
Cinnabar clouds blaze upon the Purple Tenuity.
The pure heavens unfurl their numinous splendor,
The flowing empyrean—how misty and vast!
The divine lamp shines through the long night,
The Net of Separation exhales its bright glow.
Four peaks gird the towering clouds,
Suspended essence shades the eight directions.
The Three Primes open the lofty void,
Orchid pavilions part their layered gates.
Golden ramparts mirror Jade Clarity,
Numinous beauty marks the celestial precincts.
Winds arise in the Eight Convergence Palaces,
Fierce beasts gallop through the clouds.
In the bustling Three Cavern Courts,
The perfected mingle in profusion.
Above dwell the Dry Radiance Essences,
Their hidden virtue towering and majestic.
The Great One gathers the affairs of care,
Grasping destiny, wielding the divine banner.
The Orthodox Unity treads the flourishing numen,
Summoning and gathering the myriad spirits.
The Noble Scion flanks the tranquil axle,
The Cavern Yang guards the mystery’s pivot.
At the bright dawn, the Way harmonizes with peace,
The dragon chariot lingers in measured circuit.
The Seven Radiance align with the Spirit Kings,
The whirlwind wheels traverse the ten-thousand-treed stair.
Embodied grace ascends the dark ford,
Soaring steps transcend the ridge’s ladder.
Donning brocade, one enters the divine mounds,
Resplendent, the feathered robes shimmer.
Mysteriously communing in clouded assembly,
Flying radiance bears the divine penetration.
The pure peaks bear no trace of brush,
Wondrous confluence arises in the boundless void.
Golden flowers gird the numinous chariot,
The soaring immortals, wing upon wing.
Ten thousand reins disperse into the empty,
Lush and misty, the dark upper casement.
Within arises the Blended Radiance Lord,
The Nine Emperors exalt the Supreme August.
The bright wheel reflects the Yellow Tranquility,
The feathered pearls gleam in the Dark Yang.
The celestial essence of primordial *qi*,
The Central Five are called the Nurturing Light.
Luminous coalescence gives birth to the spirit,
The Nine Perfected unite as one.
Wondrous radiance reveals the hidden reckoning,
Following resonance, it marks the divine traces.
The Muddy Pellet cavern glows with primordial light,
The moving pearl aligns with the Crimson Palace.
The Primordial Yang governs the Gate of Destiny,
The Three Spirits escort the Purple Youths.
Restraining and summoning, they return above,
Flanking the gates to attend the bright casement.
Lush and dense, they face the Morning Star,
The round flower blazes through the Three Thoroughfares.
The square fullness draws forth and receives life,
Reversing age to return to infant simplicity.
The whirlwind’s brilliance adorns the Nine Heavens,
The heavenly green encircles the cinnabar chamber.
Howling winds coil beyond the mists,
Curving descent to repose in the flowery hall.
Roaming and feasting, gazing upon ten thousand transformations,
Returning to assemble before the Spirit Empyrean King.
The immortal Way delights in the child’s life,
The ghostly Way delights in the child’s doom.
One hears only of the Way that honors life,
Never of the ghostly Way’s exaltation.
Chants and songs mingle with the celestial *qi*,
The merchant’s son lacks the proper verses.
Divine wisdom commands the Vermilion Troops,
The Five Emperors’ talismans chill the northern wastes.
Brandishing banners, they capture the myriad demons,
The jade writs restrain the Northern Feng.
The Way of spontaneous dissolution—
Not your merit that the demons are destroyed.
The dawn’s drum resounds with the long fan,
All beings rejoice upon the empyrean peak.
Looking down upon the four flights of thanksgiving,
The heavenly tribulation shall never end.
Within the wondrous arises the true radiance,
The returning chariot lingers in sorrowful delay.
Intent harmonizes in hidden resonance,
Lifting and guiding the Supreme Highest’s grace.
Soaring wings await the wondrous assembly,
Gazing into the cavern, the heart turns sorrowful.
With a whistle, a sigh, a sudden cry—
In an instant, one traverses the nine enclosures.
Gathering *qi*, returning to the primal exchange,
Merging radiance to dwell in the dark mystery.

At this, the Seven Essences halt their shining,
The layered gates open wide,
A hundred yangs surge like lightning,
The five stars hasten in their courses.
Grasping the tally, commanding the spirits,
All *qi* is summoned and pursued.
Iron bears array in ambush,
Fierce tigers transform their might.
The Six Masters behead the demons,
The Bronze Heads seize the transgressors.
The Heavenly Apes devour poison,
The Crystal Shields shatter and crumble.
The myriad spirits are annihilated,
The Six Heavens collapse and topple.
The Three Ways are rectified—
What *qi* does not return?
Mountains and rivers are overturned,
Sun and moon dim their light.
Divine beasts drop their manes,
The Golden Wings cease their flight.
The Five Emperors gird their sashes in the divine precincts,
The myriad spirits receive judgment in the Supreme Subtle.
The Supreme Highest floats its canopy above the cinnabar cliffs,
The Eight Radiance urge their chariots at the empyrean gates.
Beholding the wondrous transformations of the cavern’s source,
I rejoice in my Way, my heart at ease.

The High and Mysterious Perfected of the Great Cavern says: When one wishes to ascend the high seat and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, one must first sit upright, face due north, and strike the teeth thirty-two times. Closing the eyes, one visualizes oneself clad in a nine-colored feathered robe adorned with dragon patterns, wearing the Jade Dawn crown, and holding a nine-colored tally. A green dragon attends on the left, a white tiger guards on the right; a floral canopy shades the head, and one sits upon a lion. Immortal youths attend with incense, jade maidens scatter blossoms; purple clouds billow thickly, filling the hall, while five-colored hues of dark and yellow array before and behind, both within and without, all made radiant and clear. Then one recites the *Hidden Writ of Divine Wisdom for Vanquishing Demons*.

Upon completion, one closes the eyes and silently intones, bowing in the heart to the four directions. From the mouth, one draws the essence of the green *qi* of the Eastern Azure Yang, swallowing nine times to fill and suffuse the liver’s palace. Next, one draws the essence of the red *qi* of the Southern Cinnabar Spirit, swallowing three times to fill and suffuse the heart’s palace. Then, one draws the essence of the white *qi* of the Western Metal Soul, swallowing seven times to fill and suffuse the lungs’ palace. Next, one draws the essence of the black *qi* of the Northern Mysterious Radiance, swallowing five times to fill and suffuse the kidneys’ palace. Finally, one draws the essence of the yellow *qi* of the Central Lofty Sovereign, swallowing twelve times to fill and suffuse the spleen’s palace.

When the *qi* of the five directions has been swallowed in full, one softly intones:
*"The five *qi* blend and arise,
The essence of the Mysterious Highest,
Filling the five palaces,
The six conduits gleam bright.
Within they irrigate, without they overflow,
Both surface and interior are purified.
Banishing filth, summoning the true,
I soar to the Supreme Numinous,
Ever facing the Highest Dawn."*

After reciting the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, one shakes the left hand three times, ritually casting the Flowing Bell. Then one shakes the right hand seven times, ritually casting the Seven Origins of the Vast and Open. Next, one lifts the head, then sways the neck nine times, in accord with the celestial pattern. Then one stamps the foot once, in accord with the numinous tremor. One sways the body fourteen times to gladden the myriad spirits. Next, one wipes the eyes three times to brighten the Three Luminaries. Then one pinches the nose seven times to illumine the Bright Beam. Next, one presses the two gates behind the brows three times to block the source of evil. Then one wheels the body three times to open the Heavenly Window. Finally, one swallows saliva nine times to ingest the Jade Fluid.

When the entire body’s rites are complete, the myriad spirits all rejoice. Harmonizing the voice and rectifying the *qi*, one then recites the Jade Chapters, softly intoning:
*"Bearing heaven, treading earth,
Entering and exiting the cavern’s gate,
Left hand shaking the Flowing Bell,
Right hand casting the Seven Origins.
Girded with gold, adorned with jade,
Immortal robes fluttering,
The Eight Radiance arrayed,
Urging the chariot to ride the clouds.
Ten thousand circuits, all luminous and penetrating,
I fly into the Emperor’s Dawn."*

Thereupon, one sits upright and recites the scripture.

This is the wondrous pattern of the Great Cavern, the proper form of reverent movement. If the ritual sequence is performed correctly, the Highest will cast its gaze upon one; the Three Origins will descend to the seat; the myriad spirits will come to pay homage; heavenly demons will submit; the Five Sufferings will all be dissolved; the seven ancestors will receive blessings; divine phoenixes will come soaring; cloud-dragons will leap and dance. The host of immortals will praise one in the High Void, and the Five Elders will inscribe one’s name in the Emperor’s Register.

For all who cultivate the Supreme Way and recite the numinous chapters yet fail to perform these rites, the celestial forms are deficient and incomplete. Such negligence is insufficient for prostration and submission, and one will be mocked by the Ghostly Gods of the Northern Emperor, punished by the Three Officials, tested and thwarted by the host of demons, and perish to no avail. Thus, to transgress the Dao is easy, while to cultivate it is difficult. Only by attaining its proper forms and patterns can one ascend the steps to flight and transcendence.

**Hidden Writ of Divine Wisdom for Vanquishing Demons Within the Great Cavern**

When reciting the scripture of the Highest Lord of the Jade Void, one must visualize the true *qi* of the Lesser Lad of the Grand Tenuity, the essence of the Dryness-Spirit, glowing red, entering from the mud-pill of one’s own crown and descending to fill the root of the tongue, the palace of blood and fluids. Then one softly intones:
*"True *qi* flows downward to fill the hidden pass,
Stabilizing the spirit, securing essence, sealing the source of death.
The Jade Scripture’s wisdom illumines, communicating with the myriad spirits,
For me it summons the true destiny to abide long,
Delivering the seven ancestors to revert as womb-born immortals."*

Thereupon, one draws the red *qi* and swallows it three times to conclude. Then one recites the scripture. Upon completion, one intones again:
*"Heaven holds the great hidden treasure of life,
Called the *qi* above the Bright Beam.
Guard my sealed gate below the absolute barrier,
And receive anew the outer gate of the prison of birth."*

Then one summons the Feathered Lad of Augmented Origin to array before the pavilion of the Green Chamber, causing him to untie the hundred knots of the seven ancestors, to drift with the wind and leave their roots, to match heaven in shifting their foundation, and to enter the mysterious through transformation.

The hidden writ of the Jade Clarity further intones:
*"Primal *qi* is not originally born,
The five paths bear the numinous forth.
Male and female entrust the spirit to transformation,
The forest of stars, profound and dark, billows thickly.
The Jade Tone resounds with Supreme Harmony,
Ten thousand chants arise from the midst of nothingness.
The immortal court revolves through nine changes,
The hundred blends all attain the One.
Change holds union within the void,
Together they enter the Emperor’s hall and chamber."*

This is the secret inner writ of the Highest. Should it be divulged, the seven ancestors will bear the blame.

When reciting the scripture of the Jade Emperor of the Supreme Sovereign, one must visualize the true *qi* of the Venerable Duty of the Most Honored Unity, glowing purple, entering from the mud-pill of one’s own crown and descending to fill the Jade Pillow below, the rear gate of the mud-pill. Then one softly intones:
*"The Most Honored Unity preserves destiny,
Stabilizing the spirit and settling life.
For me it summons above the *qi* of the Emperor’s true,
Below it fills the courtyard of the Purple Gate.
The Jade Scripture, gazed upon, penetrates,
The Nine Origins shine bright.
The seven ancestors rejoice together,
All ascending to the Highest Clarity."*

Thereupon, one draws the purple *qi* and swallows it three times to conclude. Then one recites the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, one intones again:
*"My body is the ever-dying pass,
The womb’s knot harms the hundred spirits.
When the hundred spirits untie the womb’s knot,
The roots within the placenta scatter.
Seven generations enter the Emperor’s chamber,
One body unites with the divine immortals.
Divine immortals gather in the Jade Hall,
The seven ancestors are born in the Southern Palace.
Together they wear the initial clarity of governance,
Sharing the seat of the child’s Way of health.
The myriad perfected guard the body’s form,
On this day they conceal the initial brightness.
The Emperor’s One revolves male and female,
Preserving and guarding the gates of the hundred spirits.
Sealing the myriad evil portals,
Receiving office in the Nine Palaces,
Overseeing the summons of the Controller of Destiny,
Thrice daily attending the mud-pill."*

When reciting the scripture of the Jade Emperor of the Supreme Sovereign, one must visualize the true *qi* of the Imperial Lord Fengling, glowing purple and lush, entering from the mud-pill of one’s own crown and descending to fill the space between the brows, the outer palace of the Purple Gate.

Upon completion, softly intone the incantation:
"The Imperial Lord transmits the talismanic registers,
Upright *qi* summons the myriad spirits.
Above, it calls forth the Jade Perfected *qi*,
Filling and spreading between the brows.
Merging as one to generate the Emperor’s radiance,
The Three Primes perfect my transcendence.
Swift and radiant, I ride the soaring canopy,
Ascending directly to the loftiest pavilion."

Upon completion, draw in the purple *qi* and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, offer this prayer:
"Supporting the dawn’s first glow,
Purple clouds illumine the dark slopes.
Resplendent, the circular light flourishes,
Dazzling and bright, it shines through the gauze.
Subtle and distant, the numinous radiance’s origin,
Lush and scattered, the azure’s splendor.
The Nine Heavens’ halls host jade guests,
Golden chambers resound with celestial hymns.
Virtuous indeed, facing the Emperor’s guests,
Commanding the dark chariots of the summoned lords.
Seven ancestors untie the root of the womb,
Generation upon generation, they become immortals’ kin."

The Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity offers this further prayer:
"The Cinnabar Sovereign revolves the pearl,
Guarding and stabilizing the Gate of Death.
Above, the One Crimson Child,
The Mysterious Emperor congeals in heaven.
One name: Lord of No Above,
Also the Primordial of the Three Origins.
Supporting and nurturing me,
Enabling my ascent upon the cloud-wheel,
Ever seated in the Upper Clarity’s pavilion,
The Seven Mysteries as Transcendent Lords."

When reciting the Scripture of the Supreme Sovereign Purple Dawn Lord, visualize the true *qi* of the Left Non-Bearing Duke, Master Xuanchong, its jade light luminous and flowing, entering from the mud-pill of your crown and descending to fill the space beneath your left armpit, the posterior gate of the liver.

Upon completion, softly intone:
"The Non-Bearing Divine Perfected engenders the Purple Sovereign,
The Three *Qi* merge and harmonize into palace tones.
Summoning and guiding the true *qi* to stabilize the bladder,
Flowing through the Three Cinnabar Fields to meet in the Grotto Chamber,
Transforming my cinnabar countenance to attain transcendence,
Soaring to the cloud pavilions and entering the Golden Wall."

Upon completion, draw in the jade light and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, offer this prayer:
"Spirits settled, *qi* pervading,
Above, in communion with heaven.
Transcending the earthly gate,
Passing through the celestial portal.
Concealing breath in the four directions,
The Seven Stars disperse and divide.
Flying through the Yin Chamber,
Sun and moon plant their roots.
Guarding gold and treasuring jade,
Commanding and restraining the myriad spirits.
Who is the Transcendent King?
I have already attained perfection.
Concealing and preserving the feminine and masculine,
Pervading the four quarters in unity.
Binding the central azure *qi*,
Named ‘Prolonging Prosperity,’
Styled ‘Harmonious Infant.’
Governing destiny for eternal duration,
The Mysterious returns to the inner fortress,
Celebrating the expansion of the Dark Enclosure.

Revolving the hidden mechanism,
Circulating through the Supreme Unity,
Life equalizing the Two Modes."

The Hidden Writ of Jade Purity further intones:
The Great One transforms the Six Harmonies,
Five spirits nourish the Mud-Pill Palace,
Seven accumulations extinguish the Three Paths,
Blood-corpses block the Lower Pass,
Three collars face the Imperial Perfected,
Severing the roots of the womb-tree,
The Venerable One is styled Spirit Ancestor,
Of one heart with the Primordial Plain Lord,
The Heavenly Sovereign enters the Grand Clarity,
Five Elders present the talismanic writ,
Generation upon generation ascends the Feathered Palace,
Double Flowering in the sun’s central chariot,
The Primordial King first illumines essence,
Firming my root-life gate,
Protecting and assisting the flow of green qi,
Returning to the Upper Valley and Lower Mystery,
Mysterious radiance □ spirit and form,
Ascending to the wheel of the Grand Supreme,
Sun and moon join the jade collar,
Years divide with the twin luminaries,
Cinnabar script within the Jade Hall,
Ranked as Lord of Heaven Above,
To the left grasping the Feathered Terrace Lad,
To the right lifting the Golden Countenance Immortal.

Recite the *Dawn-in-Utter-None Lord’s Engraved Scripture of Mount Emei’s Grotto Palace Jade Portal Primordial Lord*, contemplating:
Imperial Minister Engraver of Essence in the Crimson Palace,
Central Radiance of the Central One in the Firm Crimson Palace,
Yellow Court Assistant Minister Returning to Upper Clarity—
Three spirit-perfected qi,
Merging azure, white, and yellow clouds,
Entering from your Mud-Pill Palace,
Descending to suffuse your body’s Three Palaces and root-life imperial chamber.

Concluding, softly intone:
Three Perfected engender Utter-None,
Jade Portal reflects the dawn glow,
Primordial Void of the Grand Plain,
Cinnabar numen thick upon Scarlet Mound,
Returning spirit to the Ninefold Repository,
Inner chant unfurls jeweled blossoms,
Hundred Passes receive the fluid elixir,
Prolonging years with the Three-Flowered Bough,
My body soars to Jade Purity,
Seven ancestors depart the Dark Capital,
Ever preserving beyond kalpas’ end,
Ten thousand generations inherit the immortal lineage.

Concluding, draw in the three-colored cloud-qi, swallowing thrice. Then halt.

Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, further intone:
Imperial Unity merges the Nine Mysteries,
Grand Plain’s Five-Flowered Essence,
Precious plumes feast in the Jade Hall,
Eight Winds fan the Grand Luminance,
Exalted One rides the Primordial Radiance,
Treading the flourishing numinous,
Seven transformations descend to the Purple Chamber,
Nine mergers purify the Five Emperors,
Body generates six-hued brilliances,
Golden radiance flows through spirit-form,
Perceiving the bathing of primordial qi within,
Golden script in the Jade Emperor’s court.

The Hidden Writ of Jade Purity further intones:
Numinous clouds first divide,
White qi billows in plainness,
Merging the Nine Mysteries,
Three and Five flow and spread,
Imperial Unity releases form,
Transcending to ascend the celestial path,
Great One breathes,
Five Flowers consolidate,
Life-Master governs the sun’s zenith,
White Prime rules the moonlit night,
Midday stills the heart,
Heart’s mystery wondrously awakens,
Evening retreats to the Mud-Pill Palace,
Hundred spirits proclaim,
Two Palaces may attain long life,
Heart and brain may endure forever.

Recite the *Scripture of the Nine Numinous True Immortal Mother of the Azure Gold Elixir Sovereign Lord of Western Origin and Tortoise Mountain*, contemplating:
The Great Grotto’s Imperial Unity Honored Lord Father reposes in true qi,
Five-colored purple cloud-smoke,
Entering from your Mud-Pill Palace,
Descending to suffuse your singular form,
Dispersing qi through the nine apertures.

Concluding, softly intone:
Nine Numinous penetrate wondrous transformation,
Golden Immortals merge at Fusang,
Imperial Unity transforms the hundred spirits,
Uniting numen with the Western Cinnabar Sovereign,
Above styled Womb Immortal Mother,
Below titled Spirit Ancestor,
Radiant splendor transcends cloud-tips,
Soughing in the Purple Tenuity Palace,
For me wielding the register of life,
Preserving truth in the Three Plain Chambers,
Wondrous radiance descends from the void,
Refining me to revert to infancy,
Seven ancestors sever the source of suffering,
Leisurely transcend the Nine Felicity Halls.

Concluding, draw in the purple cloud-qi, swallowing thrice. Then halt.

Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, further intone:
Grand Supreme Grotto Illumination,
Flying radiance of the Nine Origins,
Congealing essence, condensing qi,
Transforming qi, transmuting spirit,
Life-Master merges and blends,
Dispersing form into myriad parts,
Thousand chariots of fiery armor,
Ten thousand riders brandish banners,
All joining the Great One,
Ascending to become Imperial Immortals,
Eldest None-Rising Paces,
Second Accomplished Curved Writ,
First merging my qi,
Second merging my spirit,
Third merging my po,
Fourth merging my hun,
Fifth merging my essence,
Sixth merging my body,
My body six-merged,
Grotto numen reveals truth,
Eight Radiant Empty Chariots,
Three Plain Floating Wheels,
I and the Imperial Unity,
Together ascend Jade Dawn,
Double Flowering layered branches,
Merging with Heavenly Immortals,
Body holds the Dao register,
Generations possess life’s root,
Golden tablets, feathered talismans,
Name inscribed in the sun’s chariot,
Wishes instantly fulfilled,
Heavenly emolument abundant,
Desires as the heart directs,
Ten thousand blessings fill the gate,
Ever abiding with the Grand Supreme,
Imperial Unity in the Mud-Pill Palace,
Feminine and masculine merge and transform,
Hundred spirits entwine,
Reciting scripture ten thousand times,
Cloud chariots come to welcome,
Feasting with the Five Emperors,
Nine Lords of Sun and Moon,
Styled as Immortal Elder,
Perfected One of the Grand Clarity.

The Hidden Writ of Jade Purity’s Nine Heavens’ Upper Text,
Issuing from the Highest Oral Instructions,
Dissolving stagnation, dispersing resentment,
The Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Great Grotto True Scripture,
Their principles culminate herein.
Above, they summon the radiance of exalted numina,
Below, they extinguish the misfortunes of ten thousand demons.
Excerpted from the *Secret Essentials*, Forty-Second Yang Character Section.

Reciting once opens the thirty-nine gates of the Dark Pass,
Receiving jade nectar,
Dead qi sinks and obstructs,
Hundred spirits rejoice within,
Hundred spirits thus unobstructed,
Voices reach the Nine Mysteries,
Qi brightens the Purple Empyrean,
Echoes knock at Jade Dawn,
Five Emperors gird their sashes,
Myriad numina attend the chariot,
Life upon life comes to return,
Seven ancestors ascend and transmigrate,
Body attains feathered wings,
Riding radiance, mounting clouds,
Soaring through Jade Purity,
Rank equal to the Purple Guest,
This is the wondrous Dao of the Exalted Mystery,
The secret篇 of Jade Purity.
Excerpted from the *Secret Essentials*, Forty-Second Yang Character Section.
All confer golden names and jade characters,
Highest Immortal Perfected Ones.
Within seven hundred years,
Those whose quality accords may receive a single transmission.

Later Sages say: Upon receiving the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Great Grotto True Scripture* and practicing its cultivation,
First perform the Great Grotto’s rites and protocols,
Recite the Hidden Writ of Jade Purity,
Further contemplate the hundred spirits’ inner names,
Externally blocking the ten thousand trials,
Internally sealing the death pass.
Thus, one recitation suffices for a day and night.
Reciting the thirty-nine chapters alone,
Without the need to repeatedly follow the original ritual protocols.
If one intends to ascend the fast and recite the scripture again the next day,
Then once more follow the original procedure.

Should one wish to traverse the Five Marchmounts, to wander and observe the myriad mountains, to preserve life and halt the whitening of hair, to safeguard longevity through kalpas of years—yet not yet desire to soar aloft and depart far from the world—then on the days of the Great Year-Star, one’s own life-star, and the Eight Seasonal Nodes, one may simply recite the *Hidden Writ of Jade Purity*, inwardly contemplating the hundred spirits once through, without need to recite the *Jade Scripture*. After a hundred such recitations, qi will ascend to mingle with the dawn clouds, and the hundred spirits will coil within. After a thousand recitations, the Three Primes will descend, one’s name will be inscribed in the Emperor’s register, and one will long preserve the sun and moon, matching the years of heaven and earth. After ten thousand recitations, the Dao will be perfected: one will ride clouds and mount dragons, roam the Great Void, and lead the host of immortals. This Dao is lofty and wondrous; guard it well and do not reveal it to the untrue.

The *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters, Green-Character Hidden Writ*—one hundred twenty words—is the qi of the Nine Heavens above, congealed from the essence of purple radiance, formed into natural chapters that manifest within the Jade Purity Palace. Its text shines resplendent, illuminating the Highest Clarity, enabling the exalted to inscribe its brushstrokes and penetrate its hidden sounds, thereby upholding the Jade Abode, commanding the Nine Heavens, governing and wielding numinous power, summoning perfected ones and inspecting spirits. It was originally the token worn by the Celestial King of Primordial Beginning, transmitted to the Jade Purity Emperor-Lord, the Great King Who Dispels Demons, and the Jade Purity Divine Numinous King, along with twenty-four Jade Lads and Jade Maidens who attend the text, correcting lapses and negligence, and guarding the bodies of those who bear the text.

One who bears this text becomes equal in perfection to the Nine Heavens, one’s name is inscribed on the Cinnabar Terrace, one’s rank is aligned with the Highest Mystery, one’s body emits purple light, and one’s neck bears a halo of perfect clarity. Roaming the Great Void, the ten realms will welcome one in attendance; the Three Primes will descend, and one will feast together in the cloud-borne chariots of the heavens. To practice the Dao of divine transcendents and recite the *Highest Jade Purity Hidden Writ of the Great Grotto True Scripture*, one should sit upon a square zhang of space, the heart illumined by the *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters*. In the left hand, grasp the flowing-gold fire-bell; in the right, wield the *Huoluo* of the Seven Primes. Then the Jade Void will descend unbidden, the Great Grotto will open its gates without knocking, the ten thousand perfected will respond to the moment and gather, and the host of demons will bind themselves and perish. Directing the eight qi, revolving the five celestial bodies, one sits and commands the ten thousand spirits, employs and governs the host of immortals, qi merging with the Highest Void, form equaling the Purple Guest.

The secret mysteries of the Nine Heavens, the hidden writ of Jade Purity—should one leak these chapters, the body will be scourged by the wind-knife, and accountability will extend to the Seven Ancestors. The trials of life and death shall be as the oaths of the Nine Heavens. Those whose golden names and jade characters are arrayed in the charts of the Nine Heavens, who are deemed worthy to behold this text, shall take three feet of crimson-woven silk as ground, inscribe the cinnabar chapters upon the silk with purple brush, and present ninety feet of purple-woven silk, a golden fish, and a jade dragon. Proceeding to the master, purify oneself for ninety days, face north, and swear an oath to the Nine Heavens before transmission. The disciple shall receive it in a brocade pouch, wearing it over the heart.

Those who bear the *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters* shall have ranks aligned with the Highest Mystery; those who receive the *Jade Purity Hidden Writ* shall have ranks aligned with the Great Perfected. In sitting, rising, sleeping, and resting, they shall ever intertwine with the Jade Void, the Jade Flower shall guard the perfected at their left and right, and the Five Thearchs shall hover near the sleeping chamber. One must not mingle with the common and vulgar, nor defile the exalted perfected. To violate this is to invite the departure of spirits and the approach of demons, to be scourged and lose one’s immortality.

When bearing the *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters*, whether entering or exiting, resting or sleeping, or at the time of practicing the Dao, one should always first contemplate one’s body suffused with purple radiance, darkly veiled above, qi swirling around the body. Then knock the teeth nine times and invoke:

*"Ninefold Jade Void, eightfold purple radiance coiled,
Dark light layered, Jade Purity spills its essence.
Purple text, cinnabar writ, manifesting the Nine Heavens,
Commanding the ten thousand spirits, summoning and employing the host of immortals.
Might subduing the myriad myriads, inspecting and shearing the thousand thousands.
Echo and shadow instantly gather, five clouds emit smoke.
Flying chariots and purple canopies swiftly arrive before me.
May I ride the void, ascend the Jade Dawn."*

Conclude by drawing in the purple qi twelve times and swallowing it. After nine years of this, a canopy of purple clouds will shine and cover one’s body, one’s body will generate purple light illuminating the ten directions, one will communicate with spirits and summon the perfected, and one will penetrate and observe the Great Void.

Of old, the Lady of the Upper Prime transmitted the hidden writ to the Jade Maiden of Great Harmony; the Jade Maiden of Great Harmony transmitted it to the Lord of Young Yang. When the Lord of Yang perfected the Dao and ascended the void, he sealed the text within the grotto-chamber of the Nine Doubts, where it shall be transmitted after seven hundred years to those whose truth accords and whose mystery is penetrated. Later students who cultivate with devotion shall naturally feel the resonance if they are predestined.

*The Highest Jade Purity Hidden Writ of the Great Grotto True Scripture for Destroying Demons and Cultivating Divine Wisdom of the High Mystery* concludes.

chunks.original_text: 洞真高上玉清隐书经 经名：洞真高上玉清隐书经。 简称《玉清隐书》。 撰人不详，约出於东晋。 系早期上清派重要经典。 原本有四卷八篇，后分作四种。 即：《上清太上玉清隐书灭魔神慧高玄真经》三篇； 《上清高上灭魔玉帝神慧玉清隐书》三篇； 《上清高上灭魔洞景金元玉清隐书经》一篇； 《上清高上金元羽章玉清隐书经》一篇。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 上清太上玉清隐书灭魔神慧高玄真经 神经出自高上大洞口诀，隐书天地万精之音，以传玉清消魔王神霄玉清王，制魔召真，匡检万灵。 太上以上宫玉女、金仙玉童各二百七十人，典香拂尘，侍卫神文，秘於太上三元紫房之内，六合宫中。 玉清帝君逍遥洞清之上，晏景龙山，时引高圣玉清之宾，消魔大神神霄玉清王，曲寝琼瑶之内，金花之房，清斋三年，披诵高上高玄真丈，神奇出於自然，妙旨朗於十方，高韵落落，玉翰瑛瑛，神秀华庭，焕耀太空，八帝齐景，五老翼真，玄始映朗，天元敷陈，伏兽攘据，猛马奔惊，大帅仗旛，罗骑亿千，检魔摄邪，檄落万灵，山海静波，三光合明。 於是帝君乃自弹景龙云璈，百和合唱，琼响太虚，萧条流清，玉音激炁，八风交真於中天，五华罗仙於四嵎，神啸启於琳琅之关，妙韵发於大洞之机。 尔乃命北寒金台龙华玉女，郁萧明、定云敷、安延昌、飞四渠等，合歌高上洞神之诗，灭魔招真之曲#1，其词曰： 偶景策飞盖，迅辔浮八清。 整控启丹衢，流盻宴云营。 协神飘津波，褰趾步寒庭。 龙翰跃玉质，羽服翠紫軿。 超凌六领台，纷纷落凤城。 携提神霄王，高会太上京。 仰披三素房，长烟洒八溟。 至道趣兰阙，缥缈虚上生。 绝峰通妙观，太晖朗玉清。 积勤感太素，谁测形与名。 待劫未终旦，倏欻肇万龄。 冥运自有会，安知天地倾。 乘我自生运，策景涉北元。 流霄随我回，飞盖荫绿辕。 高登四明阙，华琼秀金门。 神晖洞兰峰，三景焕已分。 结朗始生炁，八会坦幽源。 落落玄汉初，太阳协朝晨。 灵化四盖庭，妙畅法亦全。 运理自然道，郁若高上文。 千祆无贾生，检制天魔群。 玄会大洞野，采精掇日魂。 含精炼丹房，长保无终桩。 回辇寝丹房，默想念高玄。 闲寂无尘累，盼目霄中宾。 凝神标九领，连更续长烟。 三烛朗太晖，绝空中生真。 秀景曜玉州，协神整华年。 幽遘应冥会，眇眇逐景迁。 万感自启运，良谋亦有津。 玉帝理灵襟，萧萧九重天。 独步冥领峰，从怀在无间。 自无高仙韵，蹑彼亦何绿。 道藏金极章，宝我玉清篇。 太虚洞玄清，清中生玄微。 碧云绕丹房，绝宇曜紫晖。 抗足万津波，玄步登玉扉。 八风鼓高峰，云万何凄凄。 龙凤呜九霄，禽籁唱何悲。 灵境无崖际，四顾皆空垂。 莽莽天汉涂，飘飘上清畿。 冥据应感会，玄寂真人怀。 数来劫自运，理极神自归。 明诵高上文，密求反华颓。 转诗以招真，神慧变天威。 制命合玄符，握节征太微，妙觉无凝塻，廓然灵关开。 并景反寂辕，高超绝岭飞。 玄栖重虚馆，静想高神回。

**The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Highest Dao**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Highest Dao* (abbreviated as *The Jade-Pure Hidden Writings*). Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition. Originally comprising four scrolls and eight chapters, later divided into four texts:

1. *The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings: Scripture of the Divine Wisdom of the High Mystery for Subduing Demons* (three chapters);
2. *The Supreme Highest Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Jade Emperor’s Divine Wisdom for Subduing Demons* (three chapters);
3. *The Supreme Highest Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Golden Prime and Cavern-Luminance for Subduing Demons* (one chapter);
4. *The Supreme Highest Jade-Pure Hidden Writings of the Golden Prime and Feathered Chapters* (one chapter).

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Tradition*, Zhengyi Section, Part One.

---

### *The Supreme Cavern-Perfect Jade-Pure Hidden Writings: Scripture of the Divine Wisdom of the High Mystery for Subduing Demons*

This divine scripture emerges from the oral formulas of the Supreme Great Cavern, concealing the celestial and terrestrial sounds of the myriad essences. It was transmitted to the Jade-Pure King of Divine Radiance, the Subduer of Demon Kings, to command demons and summon perfected beings, thereby rectifying and restraining the myriad spirits.

The Most High, accompanied by two hundred and seventy jade maidens of the Upper Palace and two hundred and seventy jade lads of the Golden Immortals, attends to incense and dust-whisks, guarding the divine texts in secret within the Three Primes’ Purple Chamber of the Most High, in the Palace of the Six Harmonies.

The Jade-Pure Lord of the Imperial Sovereign roams above the Cavern-Perfect, feasting on the Dragon Mountain of Radiant Scenery. At times, he invites the exalted guests of the Jade-Pure, the Great Divine Subduer of Demons, the Jade-Pure King of Divine Radiance, to recline in the chambers of jasper and jade, the golden-flowered abode. After a three-year purification fast, he unfolds and recites the *Supreme High Mystery’s Perfect Text of the Lofty Mystery*. Its divine marvels arise spontaneously; its wondrous purport illumines the ten directions. Its lofty cadences resound clearly; its jade brushstrokes gleam like crystal. The numinous splendor adorns the flowery court, blazing across the Great Void. The Eight Emperors align their visions; the Five Ancients flank the perfected. The Primordial Beginning shines forth; the Celestial Prime unfolds in full. Tamed beasts crouch in submission; fierce steeds bolt in terror. The Great Marshal brandishes his banners; a hundred million cavalry array in ranks. Demons are restrained, and evil spirits seized; proclamations disperse the myriad spirits. Mountains and seas grow still; the Three Luminaries merge in brilliance.

Thereupon, the Imperial Lord himself plucks the *Cloud-Zither of the Dragon Mountain of Radiant Scenery*. A hundred harmonies join in chorus; jade tones resonate through the Great Void. The desolate and pure flow forth; jade sounds stir the *qi*. The Eight Winds converge with the perfected at the Central Heaven; the Five Florals array the immortals at the Four Extremities. Divine whistles arise from the gates of jade and jasper; wondrous melodies issue from the mechanism of the Great Cavern.

Then he commands the Jade Maidens of the Dragon-Flower Terrace of the Northern Frigid Golden Platform—Yu Xiaoming, Ding Yunfu, An Yanchang, Fei Siqu, and others—to join in singing the *Poems of the Supreme Cavern Spirits* and the *Melodies for Subduing Demons and Summoning the Perfected*. Their lyrics declare:

> By paired radiance, we urge our flying canopies,
> Swift reins float through the Eight Pures.
> We adjust our reins to open the cinnabar thoroughfare,
> Casting glances to feast in the cloud encampments.
> Harmonizing with the divine, we drift on the waves of the ford,
> Lifting our steps to tread the frigid court.
> Dragon pennants leap with jade substance,
> Feathered robes trail in kingfisher and purple hues.
> Soaring beyond the Six Ridge Terraces,
> In profusion we descend upon the Phoenix City.
> Escorting the Divine Radiance King,
> We ascend to the grand assembly in the Supreme Capital.
> Gazing up, we part the Three Simplicities’ chambers,
> Long mists scatter across the Eight Seas.
> The Perfect Dao hastens to the Orchid Palace,
> Ethereal, it arises from the Void above.
> Towering peaks connect to wondrous visions,
> The Great Splendor illumines the Jade-Pure.
> Accumulated diligence moves the Primordial Simplicity—
> Who can fathom its form or name?
> Awaiting the kalpa’s unended dawn,
> In an instant, the myriad ages commence.
> The dark workings have their own convergence—
> How could one know the heavens and earth would overturn?
> Riding the destiny of self-arising,
> We urge our radiance to traverse the Northern Prime.
> Flowing auroras follow our return,
> Flying canopies shade the verdant axles.
> Ascending the Fourfold Brightness Gates,
> Flowering jasper adorns the Golden Portal.
> Divine radiance penetrates the Orchid Peaks,
> The Three Luminaries shine forth, already distinct.
> Congealing clarity to generate *qi*,
> The Eight Assemblies lay bare the hidden sources.
> Vast and boundless, the Primordial Han begins,
> The Great Yang harmonizes with the morning court.
> The numinous transforms the Four Canopy Courts,
> The wondrous flows unimpeded, the Dharma complete.
> The Dao of natural principle unfolds,
> Luxuriant as the Supreme Highest Texts.
> A thousand demons cannot be bargained into life—
> They are restrained, the demonic hordes of heaven.
> The Primordial Assembly roams the Great Cavern wilds,
> Gathering essences to pluck the sun’s soul.
> Containing the essence, refining in the cinnabar chamber,
> Eternally preserved without end.
> Turning the chariot to rest in the cinnabar chamber,
> Silently contemplating the High Mystery.
> Leisurely and still, free from worldly dust,
> Gazing upon the guests of the auroral realm.
> Concentrating the spirit to mark the Nine Ridges,
> Linking watches to continue the long mists.
> Three candles illumine the Great Splendor,
> The Void’s extremity gives birth to the perfected.
> Radiant scenery gleams over the Jade Continent,
> Harmonizing the spirit to order the flowery years.
> The hidden encounter responds to the dark convergence,
> Faint and distant, it follows the shifting radiance.
> Myriad inspirations arise of themselves—
> Good counsel, too, has its ford.
> The Jade Emperor governs his numinous heart,
> Whispering through the Ninefold Heavens.
> Alone, I tread the dark ridge peaks,
> My thoughts dwelling in the spaceless.
> Without the High Immortal’s cadence,
> How could I tread there, and why seek the green?
> The Dao’s treasury holds the Golden Ultimate Chapters,
> Treasuring my Jade-Pure Stanzas.

**The Jade Clarity Concealed Writ of the Great Cavern Demon-Quelling Divine Wisdom**

The dark radiance scatters at heaven’s edge,
The clear Han thins as clouds drift back.
Wondrous *qi* illumines the Three Dawns,
Cinnabar clouds blaze upon the Purple Tenuity.
The pure heavens unfurl their numinous splendor,
The flowing empyrean—how misty and vast!

The Net of Separation exhales its bright glow.
Four peaks gird the towering clouds,
Suspended essence shades the eight directions.
The Three Primes open the lofty void,
Orchid pavilions part their layered gates.

Numinous beauty marks the celestial precincts.
Winds arise in the Eight Convergence Palaces,

In the bustling Three Cavern Courts,

Above dwell the Dry Radiance Essences,

The soaring immortals, wing upon wing.

Lush and misty, the dark upper casement.
Within arises the Blended Radiance Lord,
The Nine Emperors exalt the Supreme August.
The bright wheel reflects the Yellow Tranquility,

The celestial essence of primordial *qi*,

Luminous coalescence gives birth to the spirit,

Wondrous radiance reveals the hidden reckoning,
Following resonance, it marks the divine traces.

Not your merit that the demons are destroyed.

Looking down upon the four flights of thanksgiving,

Within the wondrous arises the true radiance,
The returning chariot lingers in sorrowful delay.
Intent harmonizes in hidden resonance,
Lifting and guiding the Supreme Highest’s grace.

Gazing into the cavern, the heart turns sorrowful.

Sun and moon dim their light.
Divine beasts drop their manes,

The Supreme Highest floats its canopy above the cinnabar cliffs,
The Eight Radiance urge their chariots at the empyrean gates.

I rejoice in my Way, my heart at ease.

chunks.original_text: 大洞高玄真人曰：欲登高座，披诵《大洞真经三十九章》，当先平坐，正视北向，叩齿三十二通，闭眼思己身着九色羽衣龙文之帔，头冠玉晨之冠，手执九色之节，青龙侍左，白虎卫右，头荫华盖，下坐狮子，仙童侍香，玉女散华，紫云蓊郁，满於堂宇，五色玄黄，罗列前后，内外分明，皆使映朗，便诵灭魔神慧隐书一篇。 诵毕，又闭眼默念，心拜四方，口引东方青阳之精青炁九咽，使充布肝腑之中； 次口引南方丹灵之精赤炁三咽，使充布心腑之中； 次口引西方金魂之精白炁七咽，使充布肺腑之中； 次口引北方玄曜之精黑炁五咽，使充布肾腑之中； 次口引中央高皇之精黄炁十二咽，使充布脾腑之中。 咽五方都毕，微祝曰： 五炁混生，玄上之精，充布五府，六管鲜明，内灌外逸，表裹俱清，灭秽招真，我飞太灵，常对高晨。 诵大洞真经毕，便振左手三过，法掷流铃，振右手七过，法掷豁落七元。 次仰头，次摇颈九过，法承天。 次鼓脚一过，法震灵。 摇身二七过，以欢万神。 次拭目三过，明三光。 次捻鼻七过，通明梁。 次捻眉后两门三过，塞邪源。 次轮身三周，开天窗。 次咽液九过，服玉津。 一身都毕，万神皆欢，调声正炁，乃诵玉章，微咒曰： 承天履地，出入洞门，左振流铃，右掷七元，带金佩玉，仙衣纷纷，八景罗列，策舆乘云，万徧朗达，飞入帝晨。 毕，乃平坐诵经。 此大洞之妙格，俯仰之仪，使庠序得法，则高上盻目，三元降席，万灵朝礼，天魔降伏，五苦咸解，七祖受福，神凤来翔，云龙踊跃，众仙称善於高虚，五老刻名於帝录。 凡修上道，披诵灵章，而不行此法，亏忽天仪，於俯伏不足，则为北帝鬼神所笑，三官所罚，群妖试败，身丧无益。 故违道者易，修道者难也。 得其仪格，将有飞腾之阶级也。 大洞消魔神慧内祝隐文 读高上虚皇君道经，当思太微小童干景精真之炁，赤色焕焕，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆身舌本之下，血液之府。 毕，微祝曰： 真炁下流充幽关，镇神固精塞死源，玉经惠朗通万神，为我致真命长存，拔度七祖反胎仙。 毕，引赤炁三咽止。 便读经，经毕，又祝曰： 天有大隐生之宝，称曰明梁之上炁，守我绝塞之下户，更受生牢门之外。 乃又召益元之羽童，列于绿室之轩，使解七祖百结，随风离根，配天迁基，达变入玄。 玉清隐文又祝曰： 元炁非本生，五涂承灵出，雌雄寄神化，森罗邃幽郁，玉音响太和，万唱无中发，仙庭回九变，百混同得一，易有合虚中，俱入帝堂室。 毕。 此高上内祝秘文，泄之七祖充责。 读上皇玉虚君道经，当思太一尊神务犹收真炁，紫色爓爓，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆玉枕之下泥丸之后户。 毕，微祝曰： 太一保命，固神定生，为我上招帝真之炁，下布紫户之庭，玉经仰彻，九元朗明，七祖同欢，俱升上清。 毕，引紫炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 兆身常死关，结胎害百神，百神解胎结，披散胞内根，七世入帝室，一体合神仙，神仙会玉堂，七祖生南宫，并带理明初，同席孩道康，万真守身形，是日藏初明，帝一回雌雄，保镇百神门，闭塞万邪户，受事九宫间，典禁召司命，三日朝泥丸。 读皇上玉帝君道经，当思帝君逢陵梵真炁，紫光郁郁，从兆泥丸中入，下布两眉中间紫户之外宫。

Left hand shaking the Flowing Bell,
Right hand casting the Seven Origins.
Girded with gold, adorned with jade,
Immortal robes fluttering,
The Eight Radiance arrayed,
Urging the chariot to ride the clouds.
Ten thousand circuits, all luminous and penetrating,
I fly into the Emperor’s Dawn."*

Thereupon, one sits upright and recites the scripture.

This is the wondrous pattern of the Great Cavern, the proper form of reverent movement. If the ritual sequence is performed correctly, the Highest will cast its gaze upon one; the Three Origins will descend to the seat; the myriad spirits will come to pay homage; heavenly demons will submit; the Five Sufferings will all be dissolved; the seven ancestors will receive blessings; divine phoenixes will come soaring; cloud-dragons will leap and dance. The host of immortals will praise one in the High Void, and the Five Elders will inscribe one’s name in the Emperor’s Register.

For all who cultivate the Supreme Way and recite the numinous chapters yet fail to perform these rites, the celestial forms are deficient and incomplete. Such negligence is insufficient for prostration and submission, and one will be mocked by the Ghostly Gods of the Northern Emperor, punished by the Three Officials, tested and thwarted by the host of demons, and perish to no avail. Thus, to transgress the Dao is easy, while to cultivate it is difficult. Only by attaining its proper forms and patterns can one ascend the steps to flight and transcendence.

**Hidden Writ of Divine Wisdom for Vanquishing Demons Within the Great Cavern**

When reciting the scripture of the Highest Lord of the Jade Void, one must visualize the true *qi* of the Lesser Lad of the Grand Tenuity, the essence of the Dryness-Spirit, glowing red, entering from the mud-pill of one’s own crown and descending to fill the root of the tongue, the palace of blood and fluids. Then one softly intones:
*"True *qi* flows downward to fill the hidden pass,
Stabilizing the spirit, securing essence, sealing the source of death.
The Jade Scripture’s wisdom illumines, communicating with the myriad spirits,
For me it summons the true destiny to abide long,
Delivering the seven ancestors to revert as womb-born immortals."*

Thereupon, one draws the red *qi* and swallows it three times to conclude. Then one recites the scripture. Upon completion, one intones again:
*"Heaven holds the great hidden treasure of life,
Called the *qi* above the Bright Beam.
Guard my sealed gate below the absolute barrier,
And receive anew the outer gate of the prison of birth."*

Then one summons the Feathered Lad of Augmented Origin to array before the pavilion of the Green Chamber, causing him to untie the hundred knots of the seven ancestors, to drift with the wind and leave their roots, to match heaven in shifting their foundation, and to enter the mysterious through transformation.

The hidden writ of the Jade Clarity further intones:
*"Primal *qi* is not originally born,
The five paths bear the numinous forth.
Male and female entrust the spirit to transformation,
The forest of stars, profound and dark, billows thickly.
The Jade Tone resounds with Supreme Harmony,
Ten thousand chants arise from the midst of nothingness.
The immortal court revolves through nine changes,
The hundred blends all attain the One.
Change holds union within the void,
Together they enter the Emperor’s hall and chamber."*

This is the secret inner writ of the Highest. Should it be divulged, the seven ancestors will bear the blame.

When reciting the scripture of the Jade Emperor of the Supreme Sovereign, one must visualize the true *qi* of the Venerable Duty of the Most Honored Unity, glowing purple, entering from the mud-pill of one’s own crown and descending to fill the Jade Pillow below, the rear gate of the mud-pill. Then one softly intones:
*"The Most Honored Unity preserves destiny,
Stabilizing the spirit and settling life.
For me it summons above the *qi* of the Emperor’s true,
Below it fills the courtyard of the Purple Gate.
The Jade Scripture, gazed upon, penetrates,
The Nine Origins shine bright.
The seven ancestors rejoice together,
All ascending to the Highest Clarity."*

Thereupon, one draws the purple *qi* and swallows it three times to conclude. Then one recites the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, one intones again:
*"My body is the ever-dying pass,
The womb’s knot harms the hundred spirits.
When the hundred spirits untie the womb’s knot,
The roots within the placenta scatter.
Seven generations enter the Emperor’s chamber,
One body unites with the divine immortals.
Divine immortals gather in the Jade Hall,
The seven ancestors are born in the Southern Palace.
Together they wear the initial clarity of governance,
Sharing the seat of the child’s Way of health.
The myriad perfected guard the body’s form,
On this day they conceal the initial brightness.
The Emperor’s One revolves male and female,
Preserving and guarding the gates of the hundred spirits.
Sealing the myriad evil portals,
Receiving office in the Nine Palaces,
Overseeing the summons of the Controller of Destiny,
Thrice daily attending the mud-pill."*

When reciting the scripture of the Jade Emperor of the Supreme Sovereign, one must visualize the true *qi* of the Imperial Lord Fengling, glowing purple and lush, entering from the mud-pill of one’s own crown and descending to fill the space between the brows, the outer palace of the Purple Gate.

Upright *qi* summons the myriad spirits.

The Three Primes perfect my transcendence.
Swift and radiant, I ride the soaring canopy,
Ascending directly to the loftiest pavilion."

Upon completion, draw in the purple *qi* and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, offer this prayer:
"Supporting the dawn’s first glow,
Purple clouds illumine the dark slopes.
Resplendent, the circular light flourishes,
Dazzling and bright, it shines through the gauze.
Subtle and distant, the numinous radiance’s origin,
Lush and scattered, the azure’s splendor.
The Nine Heavens’ halls host jade guests,
Golden chambers resound with celestial hymns.
Virtuous indeed, facing the Emperor’s guests,
Commanding the dark chariots of the summoned lords.
Seven ancestors untie the root of the womb,
Generation upon generation, they become immortals’ kin."

The Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity offers this further prayer:
"The Cinnabar Sovereign revolves the pearl,
Guarding and stabilizing the Gate of Death.
Above, the One Crimson Child,
The Mysterious Emperor congeals in heaven.
One name: Lord of No Above,
Also the Primordial of the Three Origins.
Supporting and nurturing me,
Enabling my ascent upon the cloud-wheel,
Ever seated in the Upper Clarity’s pavilion,
The Seven Mysteries as Transcendent Lords."

When reciting the Scripture of the Supreme Sovereign Purple Dawn Lord, visualize the true *qi* of the Left Non-Bearing Duke, Master Xuanchong, its jade light luminous and flowing, entering from the mud-pill of your crown and descending to fill the space beneath your left armpit, the posterior gate of the liver.

Upon completion, softly intone:
"The Non-Bearing Divine Perfected engenders the Purple Sovereign,
The Three *Qi* merge and harmonize into palace tones.
Summoning and guiding the true *qi* to stabilize the bladder,
Flowing through the Three Cinnabar Fields to meet in the Grotto Chamber,
Transforming my cinnabar countenance to attain transcendence,
Soaring to the cloud pavilions and entering the Golden Wall."

Upon completion, draw in the jade light and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, offer this prayer:
"Spirits settled, *qi* pervading,
Above, in communion with heaven.
Transcending the earthly gate,
Passing through the celestial portal.
Concealing breath in the four directions,
The Seven Stars disperse and divide.
Flying through the Yin Chamber,
Sun and moon plant their roots.
Guarding gold and treasuring jade,
Commanding and restraining the myriad spirits.
Who is the Transcendent King?
I have already attained perfection.
Concealing and preserving the feminine and masculine,
Pervading the four quarters in unity.
Binding the central azure *qi*,
Named ‘Prolonging Prosperity,’
Styled ‘Harmonious Infant.’
Governing destiny for eternal duration,
The Mysterious returns to the inner fortress,
Celebrating the expansion of the Dark Enclosure.
This day I perfect my truth,
Soaring as an immortal to the Cloud Capital."

When reciting the Scripture of the Heavenly Emperor of Grand Tenuity, visualize the true *qi* of the Right White Prime, Lord Dongyang, its golden light radiant and gleaming, entering from the mud-pill of your crown and descending to fill the space beneath your right armpit, the posterior gate of the lungs.

Upon completion, softly intone:
"Dongyang’s numinous treasure flourishes the spirit’s life,
Golden light shines resplendent within the *qi*’s essence.
Summoning the true to secure the spirit, ensuring longevity,
Extracting the dark root to return to the womb’s infancy.
Harnessing the dawn’s *qi*, I ascend to Jade Clarity."

Upon completion, draw in the golden light and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, softly intone:
"Dongyang’s numinous standard,
Guarding the body’s Gate of Death.
Opening to expel the Three Corpses’ worms,
Receiving the Nine Perfected’s origin.
Untying the womb, dispersing stagnant blood,
A hundred joints engender upright spirits.
Seven ancestors extinguish the corpse’s calamity,
Eradicating the afflictions of descendants.
Black *qi* refines and generates,
Severing the womb’s root of death.
Former generations receive the Dao’s virtue,
Later ones obtain the Emperor’s transcendence.
Who are these Emperor Transcendents?
Luminous, the seven generations’ descendants.
Their ancestors enter the Cinnabar Capital,
Together seated at the Gate of Essence’s summit."

When reciting the Scripture of the Three Origins Purple Essence Lord, visualize the true *qi* of the Central Controller of Destiny, the Venerable Lord, its color like purple clouds, blazing and brilliant, entering from the mud-pill of your crown and descending to fill the Crimson Palace within the heart.

Upon completion, softly intone:
"The Controller of Destiny determines the years,
The Venerable Lord safeguards transcendence.
Conveying names to the Southern Palace,
Presenting them before the Imperial Lord.
Generation upon generation as Transcendent Kings,
Extracting the seven generations’ root.
Blessings and recompense without end,
All as proclaimed in the Jade Scripture."

Upon completion, draw in the purple cloud *qi* and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, offer this prayer:
"Converging the Three Origins’ threefold embrace,
Escorting and guiding the returned womb-infant.
Bearing the light, guarding the lower pass,
Attending the Mysterious, awaiting the moon’s clarity.
Thereupon, merging and sealing the Li’s lock,
The bright chariot receives completion.
Fortune extends through seven generations,
Calamity disperses, the Mysterious engenders.
Guarding the radiance of the six directions,
Ascending the Brahma of the seven numina.
Together engendering billions and thousands,
Suddenly ascending to the Jade Court.
The infant lingers,
Feathered robes command transcendence.
Auspicious aid by the myriad,
Fortune spreads by the thousand.
Bones reflect jade’s luster,
Blood inherits the jasper spring.
Living in joy with heaven and earth,
Sharing the same years as sun and moon."

The Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity offers this further prayer:
"Fortune spreads before the Seven Mysteries,
Sins extinguish within the Three Paths.
The numinous breath of the Nine Dawns’ tips,
Absorbing *qi* into the Supreme Emperor’s palace.
The Five Transcendents escort the Great One,
Together standing in the profound and obscure void.
Thereupon, concealing themselves in the Upper Clarity’s chamber,
Feathered brightness in the Emperor’s One’s abode."

When reciting the Scripture of the True Yang Primordial Elder, the Mysterious One Lord, visualize the true *qi* of the Life Gate’s Peach Lord, the Child’s Way of Health, its color like yellow clouds, entering from the mud-pill of your crown and descending to fill the space outside the Life Gate within the navel.

Upon completion, softly intone:
"The true and numinous upright spirit,
Named the Peach Lord.
Merging and harmonizing the Palace of Life,
Guarding and protecting the Life Gate.
Communicating transcendence and conveying *qi*,
Aligning with the radiance of precious clouds.
Seven ancestors together live,
Receiving fortune in the lofty dawn."

Upon completion, draw in the yellow cloud *qi* and swallow it thrice to conclude.

Then recite the Jade Scripture. When finished, softly intone:
"The Perfected of the Five Marchmounts,
Recording and stabilizing the Four Guests.
The Recorder hastens their arrival,
Protecting the registers and governing the people.
The Way of Health grasps the tally,
Clouds gather and report the banner.
Fragrant winds spread in eight directions,
Evil demons vanish like smoke.
All come to face the Emperor,
Myriad upon myriad, they acclaim as subjects.
Conveying my living register,
My name ascends to the Jade Gate.
Supporting and winging the Five Talismans,
Stabilizing and guarding the dusty waves."

The Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity offers this further prayer:
"The Supreme’s time is not the child,
One day, it unites essence to prolong.
This is the King of the Life Gate,
Who can summon the myriad spirits.
The myriad spirits arrive at once,
Converging at the Gate of Jade Feathers.
Commanding the dispersal of calamity,
Calamity ceases, fortune connects.
Above, resting in the Jade Hall,
Generation upon generation, receiving the name of transcendence."

When reciting the Scripture of the Supreme Prime Three Origins Lord, visualize the true *qi* of the Mud-Pill Heavenly Emperor’s Crimson Child, its *qi* like precious light, entering from the mud-pill of your crown and descending to fill the nine apertures of the mud-pill’s gate.

chunks.original_text: 读玉晨太上大道君道经，当思肺中六真上元素玉君真炁，白云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆颈外十二间梁之中。 毕，微祝曰： 六真奕奕，白光央央，回帝之景，上入丹乡，招真下流，灌我玉浆，羽裙纷纷，衣我仙裳，越过水火，飞登神京。 毕，引白炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 九合三离，紫房散分，五老正严，帝一保神，司命奏籍，奉符三元，胞树断落，血尸绝根，反胎火朱，回炁泥丸，我合九清，大混百神，身登玉房，同軿金仙，逍遥太素，徘徊三天，重华列简，黑支流玄，世为道伯，大福缠绵，上寝玉清，下息命门，五藏秀华，项负日魂，长保劫龄，后天常全。 读太清大道君道经，当思脾中五真养光君真炁，如玉光金真之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆喉内极根之户。 毕，微祝曰： 五真散灵，布炁九玄，金光曜晖，玉炁吐津，万神并畅，熙怡我身，圆光奏命籍，太一勒九天，降致八景舆，策龙驾素烟，混合三帝室，保我亿劫年。 毕，引玉光三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 晨登九景台，夕入神霄门，太一神夫子，或曰三来瓮，左执兆符籍，右携洞阳君，定生会紫房，五神更混分，混分逸帝堂，七祖绝死根，五毒炁零灭，翳津无浮连，令我尸血化，帝房出金元，三涂绝苦树，世世获天仙，常与景中王，积劫保元元。 读太极大道元景君道经，当思肝中四真青明君真炁，青云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆胃管之户膏膜之下，微祝曰： 四真常生，青光华精，徘徊秀朗垣，沈弥玉景庭，携提高上元，俯仰要五灵，拔解七叶根，与我保华婴。 毕，引青炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 帝室混身，一道万分，万分合别，是曰帝一，白帝皓灵，金霞回日，重冥幽寥，藏神化密，把兆五符，与天相毕，玉晖覆盖，无死无疾，七祖父母，超登丹室，胞根八解，死符绝灭，帝得五元，我回三七，六腋焕华，金书羽札，世为仙真，宝箓玄别，华繁曾玄，世元曲折。 读皇初紫灵元君道经，当思精血中三真元生君真炁，赤云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆鼻两孔下源之中。 毕，微祝曰： 三真焕光，流丹徘徊，离合九景，三洞金扉，上招朱童，五苦廓开，死根断落，日魂同飞，超逸十界，上升玉阶。 毕，引赤炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 七炁混合，帝一回元，结滞月散，兆命长迁，死道闭灭，断绝胞根，五藏生华，六腑金鲜，帝一保形，司命保神，五符启扉，五籍登仙，世为道王，帝师缠绵，散香龙窗，反华扬烟，七携无上，八晖九陈，流源曲液，领会六渊，名书上清，炁积寂轩，回风脱死，帝一相连，五通七合，俱生上元。 读无英中真上老君道经，当思骨节二真坚玉君真炁，碧云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆太仓五肠之口。 毕，微祝曰： 二真固神，郁勃三关，回金合玉，坚备泥丸，上通帝炁，布流金门，混化启明，合我仙魂，七祖同飞，灭绝胞根，世保道德，永享欣欣。 毕，引碧云之炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 魂生无中，布在九重，道出三极，常游绛官，三宫合化，是为紫房，紫房所在，先由明堂，明堂之内，守神桃康，风云郁郁，既清且凉，塞闭欲孔，割破恋根，其圣曰哥，其真曰霐，兆能知之，乃开金门，金门左右，忽见高贤，左曰父宁在，右曰母精延，此是景中伯，与尔登玉晨，父宁母精，世世为仙，万条重华，皆受帝一恩。

When reciting the *Scripture of the Jade Dawn and the Supreme Lord of the Great Dao*, one must visualize the true qi of the Six Perfected Ones of the Upper Prime within the lungs—radiant as white clouds—entering through the mud-pillar of one’s being and descending to fill the twelve beams of the neck. Upon completion, softly intone:

"Six Perfected, resplendent,
White light effulgent,
Revolving the Emperor’s radiance,
Ascending to the Cinnabar Homestead.
Summoning the true to flow downward,
Irrigating me with jade nectar.
Feathered skirts fluttering,
Clothing me in immortal robes.
Transcending water and fire,
Soaring to the Divine Capital."

Upon completion, draw in the white qi and swallow it thrice. Then recite the jade scripture, and when finished, intone again:

"Nine Unions, Three Separations,
Purple chambers dispersed and divided.
Five Elders in solemn majesty,
The Imperial Unity guards the spirit.
The Controller of Life presents the register,
Offering the talisman to the Three Primes.
The womb-tree withers and falls,
The blood-corpse severs its root.
Reversing the womb’s crimson fire,
Returning qi to the mud-pillar.
I merge with the Nine Pures,
The Great Confluence of a hundred spirits.
The body ascends to the Jade Chamber,
Riding alongside the Golden Immortals.
Roaming the Primal Simplicity,
Wandering the Three Heavens.
The Double Flowers array the tablets,
Black essence flows into the Mysterious.
For generations, I shall be a Daoist patriarch,
Great fortune entwined.
Above, I repose in the Jade Clarity,
Below, I rest at the Gate of Life.
The Five Viscera blossom in splendor,
The nape bears the solar essence.
Preserving kalpic longevity,
Postnatal integrity ever whole."

When reciting the *Scripture of the Supreme Clarity and the Great Lord of the Dao*, one must visualize the true qi of the Five Perfected Nurturing Radiance Lord within the spleen—hued like jade light and golden perfection—entering through the mud-pillar of one’s being and descending to fill the extreme root’s gate within the throat. "Five Perfected scatter numinosity,
Dispersing qi through the Nine Mysteries.
Golden light blazes in brilliance,
Jade qi exudes sweet dew.
The myriad spirits harmonize,
Gladdening my body.
The Rounded Radiance presents the register of life,
The Supreme Unity inscribes the Nine Heavens.
Descending the Eightfold Luminous Chariot,
Spurring dragons to ride the pristine mist.
Merging within the Three Emperor’s chambers,
Preserving my kalpas of years."

"At dawn, ascending the Ninefold Luminous Terrace,
At dusk, entering the Divine Empyrean’s gate.
The Supreme Unity’s divine master,
Also called the Threefold Advent Vessel.
Left hand holding my talismanic register,
Right hand escorting the Cavern Yang Lord.
Stabilizing life within the Purple Chamber,
The Five Spirits further intermingle.
Intermingling in the Emperor’s Hall of Leisure,
The seven ancestors sever the root of death.
The five poisons’ qi dissipates and vanishes,
The turbid streams bear no floating dross.
Commanding my corpse and blood to transform,
The Emperor’s chamber yields golden prime.
The Three Paths’ suffering-trees wither,
For generations, attaining celestial immortality.
Ever accompanying the King within the Radiance,
Accumulating kalpas to preserve the Primal Prime."

"Four Perfected, ever vital,
Azure light, essence of splendor.
Wandering the resplendent luminous walls,
Pervading the Jade Radiance’s court.
Upholding the Upper Prime,
Revering and yielding to the Five Spirits.
Uprooting the seven-leaf root,
Preserving my blossoming infant."

Upon completion, draw in the azure qi and swallow it thrice. Then recite the jade scripture, and when finished, intone again:

"The Emperor’s chamber merges the body,
One Dao, myriad divisions.
Myriad divisions unite in distinction,
This is called the Imperial Unity.
White Emperor, luminous and numinous,
Golden auroras revolve the sun.
Layered darkness, profound and silent,
Concealing the spirit’s transformations in secrecy.
Grasping my Five Talismans,
Aligning with heaven’s completion.
Jade radiance overspreads,
No death, no illness.
Seven ancestors and parents,
Transcending to the Cinnabar Chamber.
The eightfold untying of the womb-root,
The death-tally extinguished.
The Emperor obtains the Five Primes,
I return the Three Sevens.
The six armpits blaze in splendor,
Golden script and feathered missives.
For generations, I shall be an immortal perfected,
Precious registers, mysterious and distinct.
Flourishing in the ancestral mystery,
Generations without end."

When reciting the *Scripture of the Primordial Purple Numinosity Lady of the August Beginning*, one must visualize the true qi of the Three Perfected Primal Life Lord within the essence-blood—hued like crimson clouds—entering through the mud-pillar of one’s being and descending to fill the source beneath the two nostrils. Upon completion, softly intone:

"Three Perfected, blazing in light,
Flowing cinnabar, wandering in cycles.
Separating and uniting the Nine Radiant Ones,
The Three Caverns’ golden portals.
Above, summoning the Vermilion Youth,
The Five Sufferings dissolve and open.
The root of death severs and falls,
The solar essence soars in flight.
Transcending the Ten Realms,
Ascending the Jade Stair."

Upon completion, draw in the crimson qi and swallow it thrice. Then recite the jade scripture, and when finished, intone again:

"Seven qi merge and harmonize,
The Imperial Unity returns to the origin.
Stagnant knots of the moon disperse,
My life-span lengthens and transcends.
The path of death closes and vanishes,
Severing the womb-root.
The Five Viscera bloom in splendor,
The Six Bowels gleam like gold.
The Imperial Unity guards the form,
The Controller of Life guards the spirit.
The Five Talismans open the portals,
The Five Registers ascend to immortality.
For generations, I shall be a Daoist sovereign,
The Emperor’s teacher, entwined in fortune.
Scattering incense at the Dragon Window,
Returning blossoms to waft mist.
Sevenfold ascent to the Supreme,
Eightfold radiance, Ninefold Arrays.
Flowing sources, winding fluids,
Gathering at the Six Abysses.
Name inscribed in the Upper Clarity,
Qi accumulates in tranquil serenity.
Revolving winds shed death,
The Imperial Unity remains linked.
Five Penetrations, Seven Unions,
All born in the Upper Prime."

When reciting the *Scripture of the Supreme Elder Lord of the Center and the Perfected of Non-Florescence*, one must visualize the true qi of the Two Perfected Firm Jade Lords within the bones and joints—hued like azure clouds—entering through the mud-pillar of one’s being and descending to fill the mouth of the Great Granary and the five intestines. Upon completion, softly intone:

"Two Perfected, firming the spirit,
Vigorous and surging through the Three Passes.
Revolving gold to merge with jade,
Strengthening and preparing the mud-pillar.
Above, connecting with the Emperor’s qi,
Dispersing and flowing through the Golden Gate.
Merging transformations, inaugurating brightness,
Uniting with my immortal soul.
Seven ancestors ascend together,
Eradicating the womb-root.
For generations, preserving the Dao and virtue,
Ever enjoying joy and abundance."

Upon completion, draw in the azure cloud qi and swallow it thrice. Then recite the jade scripture, and when finished, intone again:

"The soul born from the Non-Being,
Spread through the Ninefold Heavens.
The Dao emerges from the Three Ultimates,
Ever roaming the Crimson Palace.
Three palaces merge and transform,
This is the Purple Chamber.
Where the Purple Chamber resides,
First is the Hall of Brightness.
Within the Hall of Brightness,
Guarding the spirit, Peach Prosperity.
Wind and clouds, lush and dense,
Clear and cool.
Sealing the apertures of desire,
Severing the root of attachment.
Its sage is called Elder Brother,
Its perfected is called Overflowing.
If one can know this,
Then the Golden Gate opens.
To the left and right of the Golden Gate,
Suddenly beholding the exalted worthies.
On the left, Father Tranquil Existence,
On the right, Mother Essence Prolonged.
These are the Lords within the Radiance,
Ascending with you to the Jade Dawn.
Father Tranquil, Mother Essence,
For generations, they shall be immortals.
Myriad branches of Double Flowers,
All receive the grace of the Imperial Unity."
