chunks.original_text: 读中央黄老君道经，当思心中一真天精君真炁，绛云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆胸中四极之口。 毕，微祝曰： 一真镇心，总领百神，百神常生，会我绛轩，上招玉炁，六液沉珍，赤景启灵，拔我七根，超逸三涂，上升南仙。 毕，引绛云之炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 帝一迥风，化合桃康，流生起福，上缢玉堂，混而合之，出入帝房，三五合一，必成仙君，七玄父母，灭尸散怨，万劫千重，皆登上清，仙曲节伏扈，广敷郁中，守我形者，司命丈人，帝君公子，深固泥丸，太微玉华，羽服扬幡，魂魄长相抱，百骨皆满神，神王生津上，超越度死门，遂友高上子，把籍玉清宾。 读青精上真内景君道经，当思九元之真拘制真炁，五色云炁，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆左耳伏晨之户。 毕，微祝曰： 九元之精，天关开窗，八景合炁，上通金房，三元帝室，反老生蓊，玉华灌溉，炼改艾容，飞霄紫舆，运我升空。 毕，便引五色云炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 太微小童，常在帝前，其名景精，其姓曰干，合形太一，被服朱丹，五符命籍，把持玉案，帝君所临，主通诸神，混合太上，司命丈人，固保灵户，五藏会分，帝仙守宅，凶种灭根，三炁郁敷，八回五烟，我得升霄，驾龙朗轩。 读太阳九炁玉贤元君道经，当思皇一之魂上归真炁，玄云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆右耳伏晨之户。 微祝曰： 皇一上真，洞生丹房，朱映兰曜，发溢明光，太元之音，朗彻九空，玄金独乐，振响琅琅，上招玉景，协我神堂，策虚升飞，游宴玉京。 毕，引玄云之炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 九宫一合，化形帝晨，上升紫房，命真召仙，会济魂魄，领括百神，七玄康乐，披苦破根，死烟灭炁，福禄充轩，兆登太霄，驾景控云，日中五帝，挟日精轮，郁将逸阜，飙景同迁。 读太初九素金华景元君道经，当思紫素左元君翳郁无刃真炁，景云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆头面之境。 毕，微祝曰： 翳郁生真，真景生空，灵炁昱昱，紫素融融，上致流津，下布我宫，身生水火，体变玉光，飞仙羽盖，升入神公，受书玉京，成我仙宗。 毕，引景云之炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 庆元吉津，流汨西田，太帝携手，命召高仙，披浊散秽，断绝死根，上一天帝，号玄凝天，曜明六合，靖寂泥丸，是为伯无上，使兆保长安，列图玉皇，并襟帝晨，五府生华，六液龙源，渊清太素，郁霭金津，万仙来朝，五岳启陈，玄愆沉散，天福奏烟，雕梁守命户，长来护死门，上生玉房，受位金仙，天之玉堂，常接帝贤，九天之中，宴盼劫年。 读九皇上真司命君道经，当思黄素中元君圆华黄刃真炁，状晨景之晖上华，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆胸腹之境。 毕，微祝曰： 九天上景，化生华晖，晃哗太空，曜真紫微，上致中黄，百神降回，散根离苦，八难豁开，七祖同升，福覆巍巍，使我神仙，八景齐飞。 毕，引景晖之华三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 太帝精魂，阳堂八灵，披散死炁，混合众生，帝一承图，三元会明，九真安安，七神宁宁，超越滞节，过度鬼兵，上升帝晨，盼乐玉庭，玄母定录，五府开清，胞根没种，血秽珍平，七祖父母，起福三清，无英明夫，掌我仙经，广神安炁，录回绝冥，闭藏死关，太混一生，长寝羽台上，固神五老室，受录上清阙，保德七元日，上上登玉霄，下下合帝一。

When reciting the *Daoist Canon of the Central Yellow and Lao Lord*, one should visualize the True Qi of the One Real Heavenly Essence Sovereign within the heart—a crimson cloud descending from the mud-pill palace of the self, flowing downward to fill the four apertures of the chest. Once complete, softly intone:

*"One Real anchors the heart,
Governing the hundred spirits.
May the hundred spirits ever flourish,
Gathering with me in the Crimson Chariot.
Above, summon the Jade Qi,
Six fluids settle as treasures.
The Red Radiance awakens the numinous,
Uprooting my seven roots,
Transcending the Three Paths,
Ascending to the Southern Immortals."*

After this, draw in the Qi of the crimson cloud and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the *Jade Canon*. Upon completion, intone once more:

*"The Imperial Unity whirls with the wind,
Transforming to unite with Peach Prosperity.
Flowing life generates fortune,
Ascending to bind the Jade Hall.
Merge and harmonize,
Entering and exiting the Imperial Chamber.
Three and Five unite as One—
Surely becoming an Immortal Lord.
The Seven Mysteries’ parents,
Extinguish the corpse and disperse resentment.
Through ten thousand kalpas and a thousand layers,
All ascend to the Upper Clarity.
The immortal melody bows in submission,
Broadly spreading through the lush center.
He who guards my form—
The Director of Destinies, the Venerable One.
The Imperial Lord’s Noble Son,
Deeply fortifies the mud-pill palace.
The Great Tenuity’s Jade Flower,
Feathered robes unfurl banners.
Soul and spirit embrace forever,
A hundred bones all filled with spirit.
The Spirit King generates fluids above,
Surpassing to cross the Gate of Death.
Then befriending the Exalted One,
Grasping the register as a guest of the Jade Clarity."*

When reciting the *Daoist Canon of the Upper True Inner Radiance Sovereign of Azure Essence*, one should visualize the True Qi of the Nine Origins’ Perfected, which constrains and governs—clouds of five colors descending from the mud-pill palace of the self, flowing downward to fill the Gate of Hidden Dawn in the left ear. Once complete, softly intone:

Opens the Heavenly Pass’s window.
Eight Radiant Qi converge,
Ascending to connect with the Golden Chamber.
The Three Origins’ Imperial Abode,
Reverses aging to generate flourishing.
Jade Flower irrigates,
Refining and transforming the mugwort-like visage.
The Flying Auroral Purple Chariot,
Carries me to ascend the void."*

After this, draw in the Qi of the five-colored clouds and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the *Jade Canon*. Upon completion, intone once more:

*"The Lesser Lad of the Great Tenuity,
Ever stands before the Emperor.
His name is Radiant Essence,
His surname is Gan.
Uniting form with the Great One,
Clad in vermilion cinnabar.
Five talismans command the register,
Holding the Jade Tablet.
Where the Imperial Lord descends,
He governs the communication of all spirits.
Merging with the Supreme,
The Director of Destinies,
Firmly protects the Numinous Gate.
The Five Viscera divide and assemble,
The Imperial Immortal guards the dwelling.
Malevolent seeds uproot their roots.
Three Qi spread lushly,
Eight revolutions, Five Smokes.
I ascend to the auroral void,
Driving the dragon’s bright chariot."*

When reciting the *Daoist Canon of the Jade Worthiness Sovereign of the Nine Qi of the Great Yang*, one should visualize the Hun-soul of the August One ascending to return to True Qi—a cloud of profound hue descending from the mud-pill palace of the self, flowing downward to fill the Gate of Hidden Dawn in the right ear. Softly intone:

*"The August One’s Upper Perfected,
Washes and generates the Cinnabar Chamber.
Vermilion illumines the orchid’s brilliance,
Radiating and overflowing with luminous light.
The sound of the Great Origin,
Resonates clearly through the Nine Voids.
The solitary joy of Mysterious Gold,
Vibrates with a ringing clarity.
Above, summon the Jade Radiance,
Harmonizing with my spirit hall.
Urging the void to ascend and fly,
Roaming and feasting in the Jade Capital."*

After this, draw in the Qi of the profound cloud and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the *Jade Canon*. Upon completion, intone once more:

*"The Nine Palaces unite as One,
Transforming form in the Imperial Dawn.
Ascending to the Purple Chamber,
Summoning the Perfected to call the Immortals.
Gathering and aiding soul and spirit,
Encompassing and embracing the hundred spirits.
The Seven Mysteries rejoice in well-being,
Shedding suffering and breaking roots.
The smoke of death extinguishes its Qi,
Fortune and emolument fill the chariot.
The self ascends to the Great Auroral Void,
Driving the radiance to harness the clouds.
The Five Emperors within the sun,
Grasp the Wheel of Solar Essence.
Lushly flourishing in transcendent abundance,
The auroral gale ascends together."*

When reciting the *Daoist Canon of the Golden Flower Radiance Sovereign of the Nine Primes*, one should visualize the True Qi of the Left Origin Sovereign of Purple Prime, Yiyu Wuren—a cloud of radiant hue descending from the mud-pill palace of the self, flowing downward to fill the boundaries of the head and face. Once complete, softly intone:

*"Yiyu generates the Perfected,
The Perfected Radiance generates the void.
Numinous Qi shines brightly,
Purple Prime fuses harmoniously.
Above, it conveys flowing fluids,
Below, it spreads through my palace.
The body generates water and fire,
The form transforms into jade light.
The Flying Immortal’s feathered canopy,
Ascends to enter the Spirit Duke.
Receiving the scripture in the Jade Capital,
Perfecting my immortal lineage."*

After this, draw in the Qi of the radiant cloud and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the *Jade Canon*. Upon completion, intone once more:

*"Auspicious fluids of Celebration Prime,
Flow and surge through the Western Field.
The Supreme Emperor takes my hand,
Summoning the Exalted Immortals.
Shedding turbidity and dispersing filth,
Severing the roots of death.
The One Heavenly Emperor,
Named the Mysterious Congealing Heaven.
Illuminating the Six Harmonies,
Pacifying the mud-pill palace.
This is the Unsurpassed Elder,
Enabling the self to preserve enduring peace.
Inscribed in the Jade Emperor’s charts,
Shoulder to shoulder with the Imperial Dawn.
The Five Palaces generate blossoms,
The Six Fluids are the dragon’s source.
The abyss clears to Great Simplicity,
Lushly misting the Golden Fluids.
Ten thousand immortals come to pay court,
The Five Peaks open and present.
Profound transgressions sink and scatter,
Heavenly fortune manifests as smoke.
The carved beam guards the Gate of Destiny,
Ever coming to protect the Gate of Death.
Above, born in the Jade Chamber,
Receiving the rank of Golden Immortal.
The Heavenly Jade Hall,
Ever connects with the Imperial Worthies.
Within the Nine Heavens,
Feasting and gazing through kalpas of years."*

When reciting the *Daoist Canon of the Director of Destinies, the Upper True Sovereign of the Nine August Ones*, one should visualize the True Qi of the Central Origin Sovereign of Yellow Prime, Yuanhua Huangren—a radiance like the morning’s splendor ascending, descending from the mud-pill palace of the self to fill the boundaries of the chest and abdomen. Once complete, softly intone:

*"The Upper Radiance of the Nine Heavens,
Transforms to generate blossoming splendor.
Resplendent through the Great Void,
Illuminating the Perfected Purple Tenuity.
Above, it conveys the Central Yellow,
A hundred spirits descend and return.
Dispersing roots to depart suffering,
The Eight Difficulties open wide.
Seven ancestors ascend together,
Fortune covers all majestically.
Enabling my spirit to become immortal,
Eight Radiant Qi fly in unison."*

After this, draw in the blossoming radiance and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the *Jade Canon*. Upon completion, intone once more:

*"The Supreme Emperor’s essence and soul,
The Eight Numinous of the Yang Hall.
Dispersing the Qi of death,
Merging and harmonizing with all beings.
The Imperial Unity receives the chart,
The Three Origins gather in clarity.
The Nine Perfected rest in tranquility,
The Seven Spirits abide in serenity.
Surpassing stagnant nodes,
Crossing beyond the ghostly troops.
Ascending to the Imperial Dawn,
Gazing joyfully upon the Jade Court.
The Mysterious Mother stabilizes the register,
The Five Palaces open to clarity.
The womb’s roots eradicate their seeds,
Blood and filth settle into peace.
Seven ancestors and parents,
Generate fortune in the Three Clarities.
The Brilliant Husband of Non-Duality,
Holds my immortal canon.
Broadly calming the spirit and settling Qi,
Reversing the register to sever darkness.
Sealing the Gate of Death,
The Great Chaos generates the One.
Eternally resting upon the Feathered Terrace,
Firmly guarding the Five Elders’ chamber.
Receiving the register in the Upper Clarity’s gates,
Preserving virtue on the Seven Origins’ days.
Above, ascending to the Jade Auroral Void,
Below, uniting with the Imperial Unity."*

chunks.original_text: 读天皇上真玉华三元君道经，当思白素右元君启明萧刃真炁，状月中之华，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆下关小腹至脚。 毕，微祝曰： 白素启明，九天同生，高虚素辔，浮景玉清，回真曲仙，流洒八溟，通幽达微，玄曜华精，使我内彻，五孔开明，神公来游，我道克成。 毕，引月华炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 魂生九炁，炁变成神，五光缠会，太一化仙，二十四真，回形帝先，九曲下户，镇生白云，黄庭六腑，含养命根，胎结胞树，种栽死山，一得拘制，受断灭源，符籍清明，金□玉轩，长为德伯，世得道恩，升登日月，遂友帝仙。 读太一上元禁君道经，当思日中司命接生真炁，三华之色，从兆泥丸中入，布兆左手之户。 毕，微祝曰： 四大乘天，天元来归，三华吐曜，司命景飞，为我招仙，七祖散开，上登大灵，日月同晖。 毕，引三华之炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 太一务犹收，召北司玄一老子，握节往来，元素把符，白元守雌，焕然晨光明，披霞升帝墉，列坐震灵席，混合五日房，白炁育尚生，青君案延昌，左携精上门，右抱合和婴，我生日月华，友宾赤炁王，八景照泥丸，朗然洞房中，婴儿为赤子，混离生玉容，五道秀金华，位为上清公，七祖断玄滞，身得乘神风，徘徊三清上，和乐返婴童。 读元虚黄房真晨君道经，当思日中桃君方盈真炁，日晖之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆右手之户。 毕，微祝曰： 元虚黄房内，日中号方盈，左宴朱领台，右携仙皇庭，寝宴三秀房，结我神始生，同飞入玄玄，七祖反华婴。 毕，引日晖之炁三咽止，便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 九元镇真，五帝缠绵，日月中王，与兆为亲，大混三五，离落魄魂，百节金□，玉液回神，五府生华，白炁运烟，充溢三清，紫房宝津，上开仙户，下塞死关，令我羽简，玉帝之前，七祖父母，反生南轩，虎服摄魔，龙旌命神，太一锦旌，召束三官，除灭死籍，刊名玉真，保生太一，日月同年。 读太极主四真人元君道经，当思左目童子飞灵真炁，日之华光，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆左目之中。 毕，咒曰： 四极太灵，元君精瑛，日华充溢，童明光光，二景相照，通我明梁，三丹启真，我道开张，毛羽罗裙，飞上上京。 毕，引华光三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 我乘混合炁，缠固九真丘，养光太昌子，并罗凝羽珠，九尊众帝生，景洞回须臾，七祖结解散，秽积忽已除，世世生福昌，玄玄获仙书，身升太霞宫，控龙宴玉虚，上朝上清皇，寝兴幸正扶。 读四斗中真人七晨散华君道经，当思右目童子晨婴真炁，月之华光，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆右目之中。 毕，微祝曰： 七晨飞华，华散三元，混合成真，上招月魂，为我降灵，启我仙门，七祖同飞，飞朝帝君。 毕，引月华光三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 三素牢张，上元老君，神生道固，我魄逸游，保兆六合恼，忧苦没曲门，死炁闭地下，身与帝一君，并襟乐六腑，镜心丹玄房，熙炁泥丸野，体曜金晖，羽录召真，白炁重郁，百神光鲜，长与日月，符籍缠绵，世保道德，永为天仙，寂寂内注，遂升帝庭。 读辰中黄景元君道经，当思肺部童子素明真炁，五关晖光，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆肺部华盖之门，上通两目之童。

Once this is complete, softly intone the prayer:

*"White Primordial Radiant Dawn,
Born with the Nine Heavens as one,
Lofty Void with reins of purity,
Floating scene in Jade Clarity.
Turning truth to curve with immortals,
Flowing and sprinkling the Eight Seas,
Penetrating the obscure to reach the subtle,
Mysterious radiance of flowery essence—
Let me inwardly pierce through,
Five apertures open to clarity.
Divine Lords come to wander,
My Dao attains completion."*

Once done, draw in the Qi of the moon’s blossom and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, intone the prayer again:

*"Soul born of Nine Qi,
Qi transforms to become spirit.
Five lights entwine and gather,
Grand Unity transfigures into immortals.
Twenty-Four Perfected,
Return form to the Imperial Ancestor.
Nine curves of the Lower Gate,
Guard life within white clouds.
Yellow Court and Six Palaces,
Nurture the root of destiny.
Womb knots and placenta-tree,
Seeds planted in the mountain of death—
Once bound and restrained,
Cut off the source of annihilation.
Registers pure and bright,
Golden chariot and Jade axle.
Ever a Virtuous Elder,
Generations receive the grace of the Dao.
Ascending to join sun and moon,

Once this is complete, softly intone the prayer:

*"Four Great Ascend to Heaven,
Heavenly Prime returns to me.
Three Blossoms spout radiance,
Controller of Life soars on the scene.
Summon immortals for me,
Seven ancestors disperse and ascend.
Together we rise to the Great Numinous,
Sun and moon shine as one."*

Once done, draw in the Qi of the Three Blossoms and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, intone the prayer again:

*"Grand Unity’s tasks are gathered,
Summoning the Northern Controller, the Primordial Elder.
Grasping the tally, coming and going,
Primal Simplicity holds the talisman.
White Prime guards the feminine,
Resplendent as the dawn’s bright light.
Donning auroras, ascending the Imperial Wall,
Seated in order on the Thunder Numinous mat.
Merging with the Five Solar Chambers,
White Qi nurtures the noble-born.
Azure Lord presses forward with prosperity,
Left hand carries the Essence Gate’s door,
Right arm embraces the Harmonious Infant.
My life blooms with sun and moon’s blossom,
Friend and guest to the Crimson Qi King.
Eight Sceneries illuminate the Mud-Pill wilds,
Luminous within the Grotto Chamber.
The Infant becomes the Crimson Child,
Merging and parting to generate jade countenance.
Five Paths flourish with golden blossoms,
Ranked as a Lord of Supreme Clarity.
Seven ancestors sever dark stagnation,
Body attains to ride the spirit-wind.
Wandering above the Three Clarities,
Joyfully returning to the Infant Child."*

When reciting the *Scripture of the Primal Void Yellow Chamber True Dawn Lord*, one must visualize the True Qi of the Peach Lord within the sun, Full Radiance, the color of solar brilliance, entering through the adept’s Mud-Pill Palace and spreading through the Gate of the right hand. Once this is complete, softly intone the prayer:

*"Within the Primal Void Yellow Chamber,
The sun’s midst is named Full Radiance.
Left feasting in the Vermilion Numinous Terrace,
Right carrying the Immortal Emperor’s Court.
Reclining in the Three Blossoms’ chamber,
Knots form my spirit’s beginning.
Together we fly into the Mysterious-Mysterious,
Seven ancestors return to the Flowery Infant."*

Once done, draw in the Qi of solar brilliance and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, intone the prayer again:

*"Nine Primes guard the true,
Five Emperors entwine and coil.
King of sun and moon,
Becomes kin to the adept.
Great Chaos of Three and Five,
Parting the hun-soul and po-soul.
Hundred joints of golden splendor,
Jade liquid returns the spirit.
Five Palaces generate blossoms,
White Qi moves the mist.
Filling the Three Clarities,
Purple Chamber’s treasure nectar.
Above, opens the immortal’s gate,
Below, seals the Gate of Death.
Let my feathered tally stand
Before the Jade Emperor.
Seven ancestors and parents,
Return to life in the Southern Pavilion.
Tiger-clad, they seize demons,
Dragon banners command spirits.
Grand Unity’s brocade banner,
Summons and binds the Three Officials.
Erasing the register of death,
Inscribing names in Jade Perfection.
Preserving life with Grand Unity,
Sun and moon share the same years."*

When reciting the *Scripture of the Four Perfected Lords of the Grand Ultimate*, one must visualize the True Qi of the Flying Numinous Child of the left eye, the radiant blossom of the sun, entering through the adept’s Mud-Pill Palace and spreading into the left eye. Once this is complete, intone the incantation:

*"Four Poles, Grand Numinous,
Prime Lord’s essence and luster.
Solar blossom fills and overflows,
Child’s clarity shines resplendent.
Two Sceneries illuminate each other,
Penetrating my luminous beam.
Three Cinnabars open the true,
My Dao unfolds and expands.
Feathered robes and silk skirts,
Flying to the Supreme Capital."*

Once done, draw in the radiant blossom and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, intone the prayer again:

*"I ride the Qi of merging chaos,
Entwining and securing the Nine Perfected Mounds.
Nurturing light with the Grandly Prosperous Child,
Together arrayed with the congealed Feathered Pearl.
Nine Honored and hosts of emperors born,
Scenery and grotto revolve in an instant.
Seven ancestors’ knots dissolve and scatter,
Filth and accumulation suddenly vanish.
Generation after generation, life flourishes,
Mysterious-Mysterious obtains the immortal scripture.
Body ascends to the Grand Auroral Palace,
Controlling dragons to feast in Jade Void.
Above, paying court to the Supreme Clarity Emperor,
Reclining and rising with the True Support."*

Once this is complete, softly intone the prayer:

*"Seven Dawns fly with blossoms,
Blossoms scatter the Three Primes.
Merging to form the true,
Above, summoning the moon’s soul.
Descend numinosity for me,
Open my immortal’s gate.
Seven ancestors fly together,
Flying to pay court to the Imperial Lord."*

Once done, draw in the radiant blossom of the moon and swallow it thrice, then cease. Proceed to recite the Jade Scripture. Upon completion, intone the prayer again:

*"Three Purities firmly spread,
Supreme Prime Elder Lord.
Spirit born, Dao secured,
My po-soul roams freely.
Preserving the adept’s Six Harmonies,
Worries and sufferings sink into the Crooked Gate.
Deathly Qi sealed beneath the earth,
Body and Imperial Unity Lord,
Together lapels joyful in the Six Palaces.
Mirroring the heart in the Cinnabar Mysterious Chamber,
Bright Qi in the Mud-Pill wilds,
Body radiant with golden brilliance.
Feathered register summons the true,
White Qi thickly lush.
Hundred spirits luminous and fresh,
Ever with sun and moon.
Registers entwine and coil,
Generations preserve virtue and power.
Eternally a Heavenly Immortal,
Silent and inwardly focused,
Ascending to the Imperial Court."*

When reciting the *Scripture of the Yellow Radiance Prime Lord of the Stellar Hour*, one must visualize the True Qi of the White Clarity Child of the lung region, the radiant light of the Five Passes, entering through the adept’s Mud-Pill Palace and spreading through the Gate of the lung’s Flowery Canopy, above to connect with the Child of both eyes.

chunks.original_text: 毕，微祝曰： 童子素明，黄云九缠，沧台飞轮，三神协真，号曰玄上景，列位高皇宾，总摄命百神，携我入紫烟。 毕，引晖光三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 二老在左右，帝魂照九垓，阴阳变其上下，太一立其中根，五神卫其生质，司命塞我死门，九宫合而为一，六合混而无量，世获仙书，福庆缠绵，五老对席，以庆三元，偕一来迎，上升帝晨，七祖滞血，皆为拔根，反胎南宫，受生帝轩，兆宴玉堂，同襟帝轮，世世列图，服羽扬旛，子子保昌，庆及后玄，长为仙伯，役使万神。 读金阙后圣太平李真天帝上景君道经，当思胎中一元白炁君务玄子、太一精魂玄归子，二神真炁，三华之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆五藏结喉之本户。 微祝曰： 金阙焕玉清，白炁映丹霞，明光郁金灵，五色吐三华，流津宴寝堂，结我始生牙，玉符召百神，威章征万魔，保此亿劫仙，道明无凶邪。 毕，引三华之炁三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 天生八炁，回合帝乡，五神奉符，司命扶将，拔断死籍，荡秽幽冥，七世解结，福延玉庭，血积沉没，三素焕清，兆升天堂，与帝合灵，世得仙契，所启必成，种年日中，植命月庭，反胎童蒙，回为孩婴，生与天同，寿与日并。 读太虚后圣无景彭室真君道经，当思结中青炁君按延昌、元君精魂保谷童，二神真炁，炁如玉华，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆五藏大胃上口。 微祝曰： 离合九灵，二真幽密，太虚重天，上携太一，雌雄混合，同仙妙室，上变九仙，下解胎结，七祖庆欣，五苦解脱，使我飞腾，灵化本质。 毕，引玉华三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 种福九天升，拔尸地门下，七玄解滞积，断树阴忧苦，反胎朱火宫，更生九玄户，真炁日日臻，祸害日日治，兆升三清堂，乘飙上景庭，命与月母俱，年随日帝生，累玄保仙籍，回老更童婴，福升六合内，受图永常生。 读太玄都九炁丈人主仙君道经，当思节中黑炁君斌来生、帝真精魂幽台王，二神真炁，玉光之色？ 从兆泥丸中入，下布兆九肠之口伏源之下。 毕，微祝曰： 太玄何寥寥，黑炁生上虚，帝真洞明景，九炁合神庐，变化十方颂，倏欻肇明初，万真炼我仙，百关自清居，七玄断胞树，九曾升福堂，上招景中子，与我登飞舆。 毕，便引玉光三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝曰： 帝魂照元阿，常镇兆生门，伏尸灭落，保魄宁神，玄母回光，奉帝玉仙，右命太一，乃及兆身，北宴上清，列为玉宾，命生日华，年合月烟，长济金房，晨景为邻，除忧伏胃门，拔苦三徒中，福积丹玄内，庆充泥丸房，百神混帝一，大变流回风，反兆朽艾形，改貌为婴童，世世入仙堂，玄玄登羽宫，大劫虽屡倾，与日方增崇。 读上清八景老君道经，当思胞中黄炁君祖明车、天帝精魂理维藏，二神真炁黄云之色，从兆泥丸中入，下布兆小肠二孔之本。 微说曰： 上清曜玄堂，八景乘天纪，黄炁协神真，精魂对帝子，太一度命籍，五符固不死，携仙带晨晖，回风反形始，拔苦出七祖，同欢九玄裹。 毕，引黄云三咽止。 便读玉经，经毕，又祝日： 白云合晨景，乘素会太微，上朝帝一室，解带皇一阶，启明金门中，三阳召上归，升我身神内，覆盖太明威，大宝九华，光映兆形，招云混真，散香要灵，月中反胎，日中受生，年享曜景，命遂无倾，身为仙王，保此上清，世受真书，玄华玉庭。

chunks.original_text: 凡欲游行五岳，历观群山，留命停白，保寿劫年，未欲飞腾远离世间者，便可以太岁、本命、八节之日，单诵玉清隐祝，内思百神一徧，不须诵玉经也。 如此百褊，则炁参晨霄，百神内缠。 千徧，三元下降，刻名帝篇，长保日月，天地齐年。 万徧道备，乘云驾龙，游行太虚，领括群仙。 此道高妙，慎宣非真。 九天玉清紫文丹章绿字隐文 紫文丹章绿字隐文，一百二十言，乃九天之上炁，凝紫晖之精，结成自然之章，表见玉清宫中。 其文焕曜，照明上清，致高上注笔，通其隐音，以纲维玉处，制命九天，匡御威神，召真检灵。 即元始天王所佩，以传玉清帝君消魔大王、玉清神霄王等，侍文玉童玉女各二十四人，纠於漏慢，营卫佩文者身。 得佩此文，则与九天齐真，名书丹台，位准高玄，身发紫光，项负圆明，游行太虚，十界司迎，致三元下降，同宴霄軿。 修行神仙之道，披诵高上玉清隐书大洞真经，当安身方丈之上，心映紫文丹章，左把流金火铃，右御豁落七元，则玉虚不招而自降，大洞不叩而发关，万真应机而感会，群魔束身而自亡，运策八炁，回转五辰，坐命万灵，役御群仙，炁合高虚，形齐紫宾。 九天之秘奥，玉清之隐文，有泄此章，身被风刀，责及七玄，生死之考，一如九天盟文。 有金名玉字，列图九天，得见此文，当以绛纹之缯三尺为地，以紫笔书丹章於缯上，赍紫纹九十尺，金鱼玉龙，诣师清斋九十日，北向告盟九天而传。 弟子受以锦囊，佩之当心也。 得佩紫文丹章，皆位准高玄，得受玉清隐书，位准太真，坐起寝息，皆与玉虚交缠，玉华卫真於左右，五帝仿髴於寝轩。 不得杂同於常俗，混秽於高真也。 犯则神逝而魔前，被拷而失仙矣。 佩紫文丹章，出入卧息，乃行道之际，恒当先思己身有紫晖之光，玄覆於上，炁绕一身，便叩齿九通而祝曰： 玉虚九重，紫晖八缠，玄光重映，玉清吐津，紫文丹书，表明九天，制命万灵，招役群仙，威摄万万，检翦千千，影响立会，五云发烟，飞舆紫盖，倏忽来前，使我乘空，高登玉晨。 毕，便引紫炁十二咽止。 如此九年，即有紫云之盖映覆兆身，身生紫光，照明十方，通神致真，洞观太虚也。 昔上元夫人以隐文授太和玉女，太和玉女授幼阳君，阳君道成升虚，以文封於九嶷洞室，七百年当授合真通玄之人。 后学精念，自当感会预有缘也。 上清太上玉清隐书灭魔神慧高玄真经竟 释音 檄音窍。

Should one wish to traverse the Five Marchmounts, to wander and observe the myriad mountains, to preserve life and halt the whitening of hair, to safeguard longevity through kalpas of years—yet not yet desire to soar aloft and depart far from the world—then on the days of the Great Year-Star, one’s own life-star, and the Eight Seasonal Nodes, one may simply recite the *Hidden Writ of Jade Purity*, inwardly contemplating the hundred spirits once through, without need to recite the *Jade Scripture*. After a hundred such recitations, qi will ascend to mingle with the dawn clouds, and the hundred spirits will coil within. After a thousand recitations, the Three Primes will descend, one’s name will be inscribed in the Emperor’s register, and one will long preserve the sun and moon, matching the years of heaven and earth. After ten thousand recitations, the Dao will be perfected: one will ride clouds and mount dragons, roam the Great Void, and lead the host of immortals. This Dao is lofty and wondrous; guard it well and do not reveal it to the untrue.

The *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters, Green-Character Hidden Writ*—one hundred twenty words—is the qi of the Nine Heavens above, congealed from the essence of purple radiance, formed into natural chapters that manifest within the Jade Purity Palace. Its text shines resplendent, illuminating the Highest Clarity, enabling the exalted to inscribe its brushstrokes and penetrate its hidden sounds, thereby upholding the Jade Abode, commanding the Nine Heavens, governing and wielding numinous power, summoning perfected ones and inspecting spirits. It was originally the token worn by the Celestial King of Primordial Beginning, transmitted to the Jade Purity Emperor-Lord, the Great King Who Dispels Demons, and the Jade Purity Divine Numinous King, along with twenty-four Jade Lads and Jade Maidens who attend the text, correcting lapses and negligence, and guarding the bodies of those who bear the text.

One who bears this text becomes equal in perfection to the Nine Heavens, one’s name is inscribed on the Cinnabar Terrace, one’s rank is aligned with the Highest Mystery, one’s body emits purple light, and one’s neck bears a halo of perfect clarity. Roaming the Great Void, the ten realms will welcome one in attendance; the Three Primes will descend, and one will feast together in the cloud-borne chariots of the heavens. To practice the Dao of divine transcendents and recite the *Highest Jade Purity Hidden Writ of the Great Grotto True Scripture*, one should sit upon a square zhang of space, the heart illumined by the *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters*. In the left hand, grasp the flowing-gold fire-bell; in the right, wield the *Huoluo* of the Seven Primes. Then the Jade Void will descend unbidden, the Great Grotto will open its gates without knocking, the ten thousand perfected will respond to the moment and gather, and the host of demons will bind themselves and perish. Directing the eight qi, revolving the five celestial bodies, one sits and commands the ten thousand spirits, employs and governs the host of immortals, qi merging with the Highest Void, form equaling the Purple Guest.

The secret mysteries of the Nine Heavens, the hidden writ of Jade Purity—should one leak these chapters, the body will be scourged by the wind-knife, and accountability will extend to the Seven Ancestors. The trials of life and death shall be as the oaths of the Nine Heavens. Those whose golden names and jade characters are arrayed in the charts of the Nine Heavens, who are deemed worthy to behold this text, shall take three feet of crimson-woven silk as ground, inscribe the cinnabar chapters upon the silk with purple brush, and present ninety feet of purple-woven silk, a golden fish, and a jade dragon. Proceeding to the master, purify oneself for ninety days, face north, and swear an oath to the Nine Heavens before transmission. The disciple shall receive it in a brocade pouch, wearing it over the heart.

Those who bear the *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters* shall have ranks aligned with the Highest Mystery; those who receive the *Jade Purity Hidden Writ* shall have ranks aligned with the Great Perfected. In sitting, rising, sleeping, and resting, they shall ever intertwine with the Jade Void, the Jade Flower shall guard the perfected at their left and right, and the Five Thearchs shall hover near the sleeping chamber. One must not mingle with the common and vulgar, nor defile the exalted perfected. To violate this is to invite the departure of spirits and the approach of demons, to be scourged and lose one’s immortality.

When bearing the *Purple Text, Cinnabar Chapters*, whether entering or exiting, resting or sleeping, or at the time of practicing the Dao, one should always first contemplate one’s body suffused with purple radiance, darkly veiled above, qi swirling around the body. Then knock the teeth nine times and invoke:

*"Ninefold Jade Void, eightfold purple radiance coiled,
Dark light layered, Jade Purity spills its essence.
Purple text, cinnabar writ, manifesting the Nine Heavens,
Commanding the ten thousand spirits, summoning and employing the host of immortals.
Might subduing the myriad myriads, inspecting and shearing the thousand thousands.
Echo and shadow instantly gather, five clouds emit smoke.
Flying chariots and purple canopies swiftly arrive before me.
May I ride the void, ascend the Jade Dawn."*

Conclude by drawing in the purple qi twelve times and swallowing it. After nine years of this, a canopy of purple clouds will shine and cover one’s body, one’s body will generate purple light illuminating the ten directions, one will communicate with spirits and summon the perfected, and one will penetrate and observe the Great Void.

Of old, the Lady of the Upper Prime transmitted the hidden writ to the Jade Maiden of Great Harmony; the Jade Maiden of Great Harmony transmitted it to the Lord of Young Yang. When the Lord of Yang perfected the Dao and ascended the void, he sealed the text within the grotto-chamber of the Nine Doubts, where it shall be transmitted after seven hundred years to those whose truth accords and whose mystery is penetrated. Later students who cultivate with devotion shall naturally feel the resonance if they are predestined.

*The Highest Jade Purity Hidden Writ of the Great Grotto True Scripture for Destroying Demons and Cultivating Divine Wisdom of the High Mystery* concludes.

*Xi* (檄) is pronounced *qiao*.
